text_show:
“Uvuluke Mufuki webe.”
1, 2. a) Mmubelu kayi uvua Solomo mufundile bansonga ku diambuluisha dia nyuma muimpe? b) Bua tshinyi mubelu wa Solomo udi kabidi utangila bena Kristo badi ne bidimu mu 50 anyi kupita apu?
MUKALENGE SOLOMO muenzeja kudi nyuma wa Nzambi, wakafundila bansonga mêyi aa: ‘Uvuluke Mufuki webe mu matuku a bunsongalume buebe, padi matuku mabi kaayi manji kulua.’ “Matuku mabi” mmatuku kayi? Solomo wakenza mudimu ne ngakuilu wa kasala bua kuleja nsombelu mukole wa mu matuku a bukula
... 
ukole bua nyuma muimpe mu 62. (1 Pet. 5:13) Kusombela mu ditunga dienyi kakutu kupepele to, kadi Petelo kavua muenze bua bidimu bia bungi bikavuaye nabi bimupangishe disanka dia kuenzela Yehowa mudimu ne muoyo mujima to.
10, 11. Londa bualu bua muntu uvua muye kuyisha muaba uvuabu dijinga dikole ne bamanyishi pakavuaye ne bidimu bia bungi.
10 Lelu, bena Kristo ba bungi bakadi ne bidimu mu 50 anyi kupita apu mbamone ne: nsombelu wabu mmushintuluke, kabidi ne: badi mua kuenzela Yehowa mudimu mu mi
...
inanga divua Ana nadi kudi Yehowa. Kakuyi mpata, dinanga diebe kudi Nzambi ndifunda mu mioyo ya bena Kristo nebe. Mbulelela padi dîyi dia Nzambi diamba ne: ‘Nsuki mitoke tòò idi tshifulu tshia butumbi, nebatshipete mu njila wa buakane.’
19 Tuetu bonso tutu ne malu atutu katuyi mua kukumbana mua kuenza mu mudimu wa Yehowa. Kadi bonso ba kutudi badi ne bukole ne makanda badi ne bua kuangata ne mushinga mêyi mafundisha ku nyuma wa Nzambi aa: ‘Uvuluke Mufuki webe padi matuku mabi kaayi manji kulua.’

‘Bansongalume ne bansongakaji kabidi, batumbishe dîna dia Yehowa.’
1. Bansonga bena Kristo ba bungi badi ne diakalenga dia kuenza midimu kayi?
TUDI mu tshikondo tshia mushinga. Lelu, bantu miliyo ya bungi badi babuela mu ntendelelu mulelela kupita kumpala. (Buak. 7:9, 10) Bansonga ba bungi badi bapeta malu mimpe padibu bambuluisha bantu bakuabu bua kumvua bulelela bua mu Bible budi bupetesha muoyo. (Buak. 22:17) Bamue bansonga badi balombola malonga a Bible, bambuluisha bantu bua kuikalabu ne ns
... 
, 24-26, 31-34.) Yehowa mmututue mushinga padiye mutupeshe budikadidi bua kudisunguila malu. Kena uleja bule bua tshikondo tshiudi mua kuyisha Bukalenge pautshidi nsonga to. Kadi Yezu wakatupesha dîyi dinene didi dituambuluisha bua kukeba tshia kumpala Bukalenge. Mushindu uudi utumikila tshidiye muambe neukupeteshe mpunga wa kuleja muudi munange Nzambi, muudi uditatshisha bua bantu bakuabu ne muudi ne dianyisha bua ditekemena dia muoyo wa tshiendelele. Paudi wela meji bua kubuela mu dibaka anyi 
...
e kuleja muvuaye mudienzeje bua kuikala ne nsombelu uvua mua kumupetesha masanka, wakafunda ne: “Binuikala ne meji makuabu mu bualu kayi bonso, Nzambi neanubuluile meji atudi batele aa. Nansha bikale munyi, mu mushindu utudi baye kumpala, tutungunuke ne kuenda mu bulongame mu njila umue eu.” (Filip. 3:15, 16) Tungunuka ne kuela meji bua dinanga dia Nzambi ne mibelu yende ya meji. Yehowa udi mua kukuambuluisha bua kusungula malu ne meji mu tshikondo tshiebe tshia bunsonga kupita muntu kayi yonso.

MABEJI A TSHISANGILU TSHIA NSOMBELU NE MUDIMU WETU WA BUENA KRISTO Ngondo 6 2017
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Yoshua wakajadika ne: dîyi nansha dimue dia ku milayi ivua Yehowa muambile Isalele kadivua dipange kukumbana. Mmunyi mutudi mua kukolesha ditabuja dietu mu milayi ya Nzambi?
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Ntshinyi tshivua tshiambuluishe Yelemiya bua kunanukila ne lungenyi lua dindila nansha muvuaye ne ntatu mikole? Tudi mua kudilongolola ku ntatu ya matuku atshilualua mushindu kayi?
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Mu tshikena kumona, Yehowa wakapesha Yehezekele muvungu ne kumuambilaye bua awudie. Didia muvungu divua diumvuija tshinyi bua Yehezekele?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Imue misangu, kuyisha lumu luimpe kudi mua kuikala kukole, kadi Nzambi mmusue bua tumuenzele mudimu ne disanka. Mmunyi mutudi mua kupeta disanka mu mudimu udibu batupesha bua kushiya?
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Tshikena kumona tshia Yehezekele tshiakakumbana musangu wa kumpala ne dibutuka dia Yelushalema wa kale. Mmunyi mudi dikumbana diatshi dia lelu ditutangila?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Tudi ne bua kutumikila mikenji ya Yehowa ya bikadilu ne dikima dionso. Mushindu kayi? Bua tshinyi bualu ebu budi ne mushinga?

Table des matières
Mukanda mufundila bena Efeso, udi utangila muena kilisto musombe anyi muikale mu miaba ya mu diulu. Diulu kadien’anu muaba wasomba1 muana wa Nzambi ; ukadi mumane kupeta muaba wende mu Kilisto Yesu. Mfumu wa diku pikalaye udi wenza mudimu kule ne nzubu wende kena mua kuela meshi a kufuanyikija yeye eu (nzubu wende) ne ditanda anyi nzubu udiye ukuatshila mudimu nansha. Kupanga kuikala kuende kakuena kunvuija ne kena ne « kuende », kudi mutshima wende mutekemene, kudi masanka en
... 
 diakula diende, udi ulesha mu shap. 4 ne ku 6 luendu kayi ludi lukumbanangana ne dibikila edi ditambe bunene (1 Tesal. 2. 12). Ludi ne bua kumueneka ku mpala mu ngikadilu udi utapuluka ne meshi a kudibandisha : kudipuekesha ne lutulu ne mu kuikalangana ne luse ne mu tshisuikidi tshia ditalala. Bilondeshele ditekemena dia, Nyuma umua udi utuangasha bitupa bia mubidi umua (kadi bantu bakavudisha ekelesia ya bungi, ne ekelesia yonso muikale ne bantu bende). Ku bukokeshi bua Mukelenge umue, ditabus
...
una biakane.
Biluilu ebi bidi bikole bua kubiluata patuikala munkatshi mua nvita. Tubiluata katata ne tuikala nabi « bikondo bionso » (mv. 18), nunku netuikale bajadikibua ku dikubibua mu « dituku dibi » (mv. 13). Ku bualu bua kutendelelela, katupu muoyo eku kudi ne tshiena bualu tshia Mudimu wa Nzambi. Mupostolo wakadi ulomba bualu ebu. Wakadi mujadikibua bua kusangana kudi bena Efeso kabingila kanene ku bualu bua lumu luimpe ne bua Ekelesia. Mukelenge amanye kabidi mua kumuona malu aa kutudi !

Muntu yonso udi ne bukokeshi bwa kwikala ne bwena ditunga dyende.
Muntu nansha umwe kena mwa kupadibwe patupu bwena ditunga, anyi bukokeshi bwa kushintulula bwena ditunga.

Mulume ne mukaji bakadi bakumbaje mvula ya dibaka badi ne bukokeshi bwa kuselengana ne kwasa diku, kakuyi mukanda wa cisamba, ditunga anyi citendelelu. Makokeshi abu adi momumwe bwa bidi bitangila mbangilu wa dibaka, nsombelu ne dishipa dya dibaka.

Mafuku 30 wa ba mafuku 30 a kashipu-nkenza
(Trente juin) du trente juin,

(Dituku dya cijila) ikala ntemu

Elifaza:
Pamuapa muena Temana wa mu buloba bua Edome. Yelemiya 49:7 udi uleja ne: Temana uvua muaba uvua meji onso a bena Edome masangile
Bidi bimueneka ne: Elifaza ke uvua muntu mukole uvua ne dîyi dia kuamba ku bantu bavua balue ‘kusamba’ yobo, ne yeye ke uvua muakule kumpala. Wakakula misangu isatu mutantshi mule kupita bena diende babidi
Malu a dishima avuaye muambe:
Wakapepeja muoyo mutoke wa Yobo, kuambaye ne: Nzambi katu weyemena batendeledi bende to (Yobo 4, 5)
Wakamba muvua Yobo muena b
... 
di ne: kavua utshina Nzambi nansha kakese (Yobo 15)
Wakabanda Yobo ne: mmuena lukuka ne muena malu mabi, kuambaye ne: muntu kena ne mushinga kudi Nzambi to (Yobo 22)
Biledada:
Wa mu ndelanganyi ya Shua. Uvua mua kuikala musombele ku muelelu kua musulu wa Efelata
Yeye ke muntu muibidi uvua muakule. Uvua muakule anu kakese misangu isatu, kadi mêyi ende avua atapa ku muoyo kupita avua Elifaza muakule
Malu a dishima avuaye muambe:
Wakamba ne: bana ba Yobo bavua benze bubi ke bualu kayi bavua bakumba
...
bo muine uvua mubenge Nzambi (Yobo 8)
Wakamba ne: Yobo uvua muenji wa malu mabi (Yobo 18)
Wakamba ne: muoyo mutoke wa muntu udi tshianana (Yobo 25)
Sofâ:
Muena Namata, uvua pamuapa wa ku nord-ouest kua Arabie
Yeye ke muntu muisatu uvua muakule, mubande Yobo ne mêyi mashile. Uvua muakule anu misangu ibidi
Malu a dishima avuaye muambe:
Wakamba muvua Yobo wakula mêyi a bungi a patupu, umuambila bua umbushe malu ende mabi (Yobo 11)
Wakamba ne: Yobo uvua muntu mubi uvua musue kuenza mpekatu (Yobo 20)

1. Yehezekele uvua mumone tshinyi?
UDI mua kumvua bishi wewe mutuilangane ne bualu buvua bufikile muprofete Yehezekele kukadi bidimu 2500? Fuanyikija ne: udi wenda usemena pabuipi ne ntempelo munene udi ubalakana ne muikale ne bibambalu bia bungi. Muanjelu wa bukole bua bungi udi wenda ukuleja muaba muimpe menemene eu. Nudi nubanda ku tubandilu muanda mutekete tudi tufikisha ku tshimue tshia ku biibi bisatu. Bibuelelu ebi bidi bikukemesha bikole ne bikuenza buôwa. Bidi bule bua metre matue ku 30
... 
akolesha ne kutokesha bimpe lungenyi lua mu Bible alu. Mu 1951, bakapatula liste wa nkonko ne mandamuna bua kuambuluisha bantu ba Nzambi bua kumanyabu mua kuyukila ne baminganga. Pa buloba bujima, bayidi ba Kristo ba lulamatu bavua bashala balamate dipangadika diabu ne dikima nansha pavuabu kabayi babangata ne mushinga, babakengesha anyi pavuabu kumpala kua buluishi bukole. Kadi Kristo wakatungunuka ne kusaka bulongolodi buende bua kufilabu diambuluisha divua dikengela. Bakapatula malu makuabu n
...
hibumba tshia Nsentedi tshia dia 1/3/1999 tshiakaleja ne: tshikena kumona tshia ntempelo tshivua Yehezekele mumone tshidi mu milayi ya dijadikulula ne tshidi tshikumbana mu mushindu munene mu matuku etu aa.
^ tshik. 6 Mutshipu eu uvua ukandika muntu mulume bua kuikalabu ne muntu mukaji nkayabu mu nzubu tshiibi tshinjila bobu kabayi baselangane peshi kabayi bana ba muntu. Munkatshi mua bidimu ndambu, bavua bambulula mutshipu eu mu mêku a Betele mu programe wa Ntendelelu wa mu dinda dituku dionso.

Also, qr and x are only used when using words borrowed from other languages. In most cases the context can help you to know and identify the true time of the verb and to place the message in time. Kadi ndi nguvua butekete buanyi ne ndi nkulomba ne unguuje ne bukole buebe Enza bua ne misalu yonso ya anyima wanyi ikale bu yebe, umbuikile mu wewa muine.
Waya bimpa Tshisekedi wa Mulumba! Tshisekedi uvua tshilobo tshia mvita ya budikadidi! Nennange ou nendwe kunanga:

UDI umona disanka mu mêsu a mulongi webe wa Bible padiye upeta diumvuija dia mvese unudi nufuma ku dikonkonona nende. Udi ukuebeja ne lutulu ne: “Udi usua kuamba ne: Bible udi ulongesha ne: tudi mua kushala ne muoyo kashidi mu Mparadizu anu pa buloba apa anyi?” Muanetu unudi nende mu buambi udi utua mimuemue ne umuebeja ne: “Bible mmuambe tshinyi?” Bu mudibi bikemesha mulongi, udi ukupa mutu ne wamba ne: “Ndi nkema bua mumvua katshia tshiyi muanji kumanya bualu ebu.” Udi uvuluka ne: mbingu mikese kumpala, uvua muambe mêyi a muomumue pavuaye mulonge bua musangu wa kumpala ne: dîna dia Nzambi n’Yehowa.
Kutuku muanji kupeta bualu bua nunku anyi? Bikadi bifikile bantu ba Nzambi ba bungi. Malu makese adi mua kutuvuluija dipa dia mushinga didibu batupeshe, mmumue ne: dimanya dia bulelela. Anji elabi meji kakese: Mmunyi muuvua mufike ku dipeta dipa edi? Netuandamune lukonko elu mu tshitupa etshi. Mushindu udi bantu ba Nzambi bapete butoke mu nyuma ku kakese ku kakese, ntshijadiki tshinene tshia mudi Bukalenge bua Nzambi buikale bualu bulelela. Mu bule bua bidimu lukama, Yezu Kristo Mukalenge wabu mmutabalele bua bantu ba Nzambi balongeshibue bulelela.

Patrick Muyaya ne Julien Paluku bavwa bakwila lufu lwa bena Kongu nkama ibidi makumi mwanda muteketa ne ibidi (272) bashebeya kudi ntomboji ya M23 kuluseka lwa Kishishe, mu tshikosu tsha ngumu ya lumingu tshifila mudimwa dia matuku atanu a ngondu wa dikumi ne mwibidi tshidimu tshidi panshi etshi
Mena momekela mianda ya dikobolola, Patrick Muyaya ne mwenende momekela mianda ya biapu, Julien Paluku bavwa bikala bakwila kabidi dishebeya dia bantu kuluseka lwa Kishishe mu territoire wa Rutshuru.
Pat
... 
nyiki ba Kongu ne bikala bapuwa mu dishebeya dia bena Kongu, wambi Patrick Muyaya.
Mudiangata dia diyi, Julien Paluku mwikala mumanya biakane plovinse wa Nord-Kivu kupitshila dilombola dienda Ku mutu kwenda bidimu dikumi ne ibidi, uvwa mufila kipatshila ka nvita kuluseka lwa Nord Kivu.
Uleja luse kudi bena Kongu badi batutshibwa kudi bwenzavi bwa ntomboji ya M23, Julien Paluku wakufila kalata ka territoire Rutshuru musangidibwa pangatshi pa ditunga dia Rwanda ne dia Ouganda.
Mulombodi wa kale wa
...
mona mwa kulubulwishibwa. Kupitshila kikebulula edi, tudi baswa bwase Tubadi twa CPI tukwata bantomboji badi bikala bakwila bashipe bantu mu kongu, ufwa leja.
Tudi tubala kushebeya diabunyi kwa bantu kuluseka lwa Eseta wa ditunga dia Kongu. Mu matuku aha bafwa badi dikumi dia kama ne kama ya binunu (10 millions de morts). Misangu dikumi kupita lufu lwa bena Rwanda. Tudi tubala dishebeya dia bantu kuluseka lwa Makobola, Bunagana, Kasika, Tingi Tingi, Tamugena, Rugari ne lelu, Kishishe.
CH. Kabeya

MAFESTO a lelu adi mamanyike (a bitendelelu ne a tshianana) kaatu mangatshila mu Bible to. Kadi mmafumine kuepi? Wewe ne mushindu wa kubala mikanda mikuabu, neukeme bua kumanya kutu mafesto atubu benza mu ditunga dienu mafumine. Tuangatabi amue a kudiwu.
Pasaka. Mukanda kampanda udi wamba ne: “Kakuena muaba nansha umue mu Dipungila Dipiadipia udibu benza Pasaka to.” (The Encyclopædia Britannica) Kadi Pasaka eu wakatuadija bishi? Mmufumine mu ntendelelu wa bampangano. Nansha mutubu bamba ne: badi
... 
s César wakateka dituku dia 1 dia Tshiongo [Janvier] bu Dituku dia Kumpala dia Tshidimu mu 46 K.B.B. Divua dituku divua bena Lomo bateke bua Janus, nzambi wa biibi binene ne bikese ne wa ntuadijilu. Dîna dia Janvier ndifumine ku dîna dia Janus, nzambi eu uvua ne mpala ibidi: umue mutangile kumpala mukuabu mutangile kunyima.” (The World Book Encyclopedia) Nunku, difesto dia Bunane ndifumine ku malu a bampangano.
Halloween. Mukanda kampanda udi wamba ne: “Bilele bia Halloween bidi bifumina ku bile
...
uakula bua mafesto onso atu enzeka pa buloba to. Tshidibi, Yehowa kêna wanyisha difesto dionso didi ditumbisha muntu anyi tshisumbu kampanda tshienza kudi bantu to. (Yelemiya 17:5-7; Bienzedi 10:25, 26) Kupu muoyo kabidi ne: mushindu wakatuadija difesto dionso dia malu a nzambi ke udi wenza ne: disankishe anyi dibungamije Nzambi. (Yeshaya 52:11; Buakabuluibua 18:4) Mikenji ya mu Bible idi mu Nshapita wa 16 idi mua kukuleja mudi Nzambi umona dienza mafesto adi kaayi a bena nzambi adi matangalake.

Bible ku Enternete | BIBLE—NKUDIMUINU WA BULONGOLODI BUPIABUPIA
Wa Davidi.
138 Nenkutumbishe ne muoyo wanyi mujima.+Kumpala kua nzambi mikuabu,Nenkuimbile misambu ya butumbi.
2 Nenginame mutangile ku ntempelo webe wa tshijila,+Ne nentumbishe dîna diebe+Bua bualu bua dinanga diebe dia lulamatu ne bua lulamatu luebe.
Bualu udi mutumbishe dîyi diebe ne dîna diebe ku mutu kua bintu bikuabu bionso.
3 Dituku dimvua mukubikile, wakangandamuna;+Wakampesha dikima ne bukole.+
4 Bakalenge bonso ba pa buloba nebakutumbishe, wewe Yehowa,+Bualu nebikale bamane kumvua milayi iuvua mulaye.
5 Nebimbe bua njila ya Yehowa,Bualu butumbi bua Yehowa mbunene.+
6 Nansha mudi Yehowa kuulu, udi umona bena budipuekeshi,+Kadi badibandishi udi ubamanyina anu ku bule.+
7 Nansha pandi ngendela munkatshi mua njiwu, wewe neundame ne muoyo.+Udi wolola tshianza tshiebe bua kupangisha tshiji tshia bena lukuna banyi;Tshianza tshiebe tshia balume netshimpandishe.
8 Yehowa neankumbajile malu onso.Yehowa wanyi, dinanga diebe dia lulamatu didi dishalaku kashidi;+Kulekedi midimu ya bianza biebe.+

Utshidiku ututshila muoyo ku bikondo bimpe bia kale biuvua mupitshishe ne bantu ba Yehowa, bu mudi bisangilu bia tshisumbu bivua bikukoleshe, mpungilu kampanda uvua mukusankishe, bualu kampanda buimpe buuvua mupete mu buambi, nansha anu muyiki mulenga ne bena Kristo nebe anyi? Kuena mupue Yehowa muoyo to, ne yeye pende ki mmukupue muoyo. Utshidi uvuluka mudimu webe wa lulamatu ne dianyisha dionso. Kabidi mmusue kukuambuluisha bua upingane kudiye.
Yehowa udi wamba ne: ‘Meme nkayanyi nendonde mikoko yanyi, [nenyilame, NWT]. Bu mudi mulami wa mikoko ukeba tshisumbu tshia mikoko yende mu dituku didiyi mitangadijibue, nunku nenkebe mikoko yanyi; nenyisungile ku miaba kudiyi mitangadijibue.’—Yehezekele 34:11, 12.

1. Kudi lumu ludi lufumina kudi Nzambi. Udiku mulumanye anyi?
Nzambi mmusue bua bantu bikale ne disanka pa buloba. Wakafuka buloba ne bintu bionso bidipu bualu mmunange bantu. Mu katupa kîpi emu, neenze bua bantu ba miaba yonso bikale ne nsombelu muimpe. Neabumbushile malu onso adi abakebela ntatu.
Bukalenge nansha bumue kabutu bukokeshe bua kujikija tshikisu ne masama ne lufu to. Kadi, kudi lumu luimpe. Mu katupa kîpi emu, Nzambi neumbushe makalenge onso a bana ba bantu bua kuteka bukalenge buende. Bukalenge ebu nebuenze bua bantu bikale ne ditalala ne makanda a mubidi.
2. Lumu luimpe ludi lulomba bua kuenza malu ne lukasa bua tshinyi?
Makenga neajike anu pikala Nzambi mumbushe bantu babi pa buloba. (Sefanya 2:3) Kadi Nzambi neumbushe bantu babi pa buloba dîba kayi? Dîyi dia Nzambi dikavua diakule bua ntatu idi nayi bantu lelu. Malu adi enzeka lelu, adi aleja ne: Nzambi ukadi pa kujikija ntatu eyi.
3. Tshitudi ne bua kuenza ntshinyi?
Tudi ne bua kulonga malu adi atangila Nzambi. Malu aa adi mu Bible. Bible udi bu mukanda udi tatu muimpe mutumine bana bende. Udi utuleja mutudi mua kuikala bimpe lelu eu, ne tshitudi mua kuenza bua kupeta muoyo wa tshiendelele kumpala kua matuku eku. Kadi wamanya! Bamue bantu kabakusanka padibu bamona muntu mukuabu ukuambuluisha bua kumvua Bible bimpe to. Kadi bu mudi Nzambi mutulaye malu mimpe a dikema kumpala eku, katuena mua kuitaba bua muntu nansha yeye nganyi atupangishe bua kulonga Bible to.

MATAYI 21:12, 13, 18, 19 MÂKO 11:12-18 LUKA 19:45-48 YONE 12:20-27
YEZU UDI WELA MUTSHI WA MFIGI MULAWU NE UKEZULA NTEMPELO
YEZU UVUA NE BUA KUFUA BUA BANTU BA BUNGI BAPETE MUOYO
Yezu ne bayidi bende badi bafuma ku dipitshisha butuku buisatu mu Betania katshia bafuma mu Yeliko. Mpindieu patshiatshia mu Dimue dia 10 ngondo wa Nisana, badi baya batangile mu Yelushalema. Yezu udi ne nzala. Nunku padiye umona mutshi wa mfigi, udi uya mutangilaku. Mutshi au uvuaku mukuame tumuma anyi?
Tudi ku ndekelu
... 
mu ba bakuidi, bafundi ne balombodi ba bantu bakumvua malu avua Yezu muenze, ne bakajinga ne muabu muonso bua bamushipe. Kadi bakatuilangana ne lutatu kampanda. Kabavua bamanye tshiakuenza bua kushipa Yezu to, bualu bantu bavua balua bapite bungi bua kumuteleja.
Bena Yuda ne bantu ba bisamba bia bende bavua bitabe ntendelelu wa bena Yuda bavua balue bua Pasaka. Munkatshi muabu muvua bena Greke bavua balue bua kutendelela mu tshibilu etshi. Bantu aba bakatuilangana ne Filipo, pamuapa bakaya kudiy
...
utu dimpe be! Bantu badi Tatu wambika bunême nebakokeshe pamue ne Kristo mu Bukalenge bua Nzambi.
Bu muvua Yezu mumanye ne: uvua ne bua kukenga bikole ne kufua lufu lubi, wakamba ne: “Ndi ne dipampakana mpindieu, ngambe tshinyi? Tatu, umpandishe ku dîba edi.” Kadi Yezu kavua musue kubenga kukumbaja disua dia Nzambi to. Ke kutungunukaye wamba ne: “Nansha nanku, bua bualu ebu ke bundi mufikile ku dîba edi.” (Yone 12:27) Yezu wakitaba malu onso avua Nzambi mulongolole too ne lufu luende bu mulambu.

Katupa kakese Yezu mumane kuakula bua difuilangana luse kua Mufalese Simona, wakatuadija kunyunguluka musangu muibidi mu Galela bua kuyisha. Etshi tshivua tshidimu tshibidi tshivuaye uyisha, ne kavua wenza luendu nkayende to. Bapostolo 12 bavua nende, pamue ne bakaji bakuabu bavuaye ‘mumbushe nyuma mibi ne muondope mabedi
... 
mujimije lungenyi.”—Mâko 3:21.
Kadi malu avuaye muenze akajadika tshinyi? Yezu uvua ufuma ku diondopa muntu uvua ne demon, ukadi mpindieu umona ne wakula. Kakuvua muntu uvua mua kuvila bualu abu to. Nunku bafundi ne Bafalese bakakeba bua kunyangila Yezu lumu ne malu a dishima. Bakamba ne: “Muntu eu udi wipata bademon ku diambuluisha dia Belezebula, mfumu wa bademon.”—Matayi 12:24.
Yezu uvua mumanye meji avua bafundi ne Bafalese bela, ke bualu kayi wakamba ne: “Bukalenge buonso budi bupanduluke b
...
 Nzambi, uvua wenza malu ne diambuluisha dia Yehowa.
Yezu uvua udimuija baluishi bena dia Satana abu ne: “Nebafuile bana ba bantu luse bua malu onso, nansha bobu benze mpekatu ya mushindu kayi anyi bapende Nzambi bipendu bia mushindu kayi. Kadi muntu yonso udi upenda nyuma muimpe, kakufuidibua luse kashidi, kadi udi ne tshibawu tshia mpekatu wa tshiendelele.” (Mâko 3:28, 29) Ela meji tshivua bualu ebu mua kukebela bantu bavua bamba malu avua nyuma wa Nzambi wenza patoke ne: Satana ke uvua uenza!

Itali, anyi ditunga dia Itali, ditunga didi ku Sud kua Mputu ne ku Ouest kua Mputu. Tshitupa etshi tshidi tshienza ne tshidila tshidi tshibuela mu Mbuu wa Méditerranée, ne mikuna ya Alpes ku mikalu ya ku Nord, ne bidiila bitue ku 800, nangananga Sicile ne Sardaigne. ditunga dia Italie didi ne mikalu ne ditunga dia France, dia Suisse, dia Autriche, dia Slovénie, ne matunga abidi: Vatican City ne San Marino. I ditunga dia dikumi didi ditambe bunene mu Mputu, didi ne bunene bua kilometre 301.340 ne ditunga dia tshisatu didi ne bantu ba bungi mu matunga a ku Mputu, didi ne bantu miliyo 60. Mbanza munene wa ditunga dia Italie ne tshimenga tshinene ntshia Lomo; mu bimenga bikuabu binene mudi Milan, Naples, Turin, Palerme, Bologne, Florence, Gênes ne Venise.

Bamue bantu badi badiebeja bikala muyuki wa Davidi ne Goleyata mulelela anyi mbualu bufuikakaja. Dielakana dia nunku divuaku dikuluile pauvua ubala tshiena-bualu tshishale anyi? Biobi nanku, suaku ukonkonone mandamuna a nkonko isatu eyi:
1 | Muntu wetu eu udiku mua kuikala bule bua metre 2 ne santimetre 90 anyi?
Bible udi wamba ne: Goleyata uvua bule bua ‘coudées [nkubita] isambombo ne ntanta wa tshianza.’ (1 Samuele 17:4) Coudée anyi nkubita udibu bakuila muaba eu uvua ne bule bua santimetre 44
... 
; 22:43-45) Muyuki udi wakula bua Bumasiya bua Yezu udi ne bijadiki bibidi bidi bileja ne: uvua wa mu ndelanganyi ya Mukalenge Davidi. (Matayi 1:6-16; Luka 3:23-31) Bushuwa, Davidi uvua muntu mulelela.
3 | Muaba udi malu adi malonda mu muyuki eu menzekele mmuaba mulelela anyi?
Bible udi wamba ne: mvita eyi yakenzekela mu tshibandabanda tshia Ela. Uvua muaba musunguluke, bualu bena Peleshete bavua base tshitudilu tshiabu pa mukuna kampanda uvua pankatshi pa bimenga bibidi, tshia Soko ne tshia Aze
...
mafinunuke atanu, ne dimue dia ku mabue au ke divuaye mushipe nadi Goleyata.” Anu bu bantu bakuabu ba bungi, muntu uvua muye kuendakana eu, wakakema bikole bua kumona bujalame budi nabu Bible mu tumalu tuonso.
Kakuena tshijadiki nansha tshimue tshidi mua kutusake bua kuela muyuki wa kale eu mpata to. Udi wakula bua bantu balelela ne bua miaba milelela. Bualu bua mushinga, muyuki eu udi mu Dîyi dia Nzambi difundisha ku nyuma wende, nunku udi ufumina kudi Nzambi wa bulelela udi kayi mua ‘kudinga.’

Yehowa kena ne kansungasunga nansha. (Bz 10:34, 35) Udi witaba bantu badi “bafumina mu matunga onso ne mu bisamba bionso ne mu bantu bonso ne mu miakulu yonso.” (Bua 7:9) Nunku, lukinu anyi disungulujangana kabiena ne bua kuikala mu tshisumbu tshia bena Kristo nansha. (Yak 2:1-4) Ku diambuluisha dia dilongesha dia Nzambi, tudi mu mparadizu wa mu nyuma mutudi bamone bantu ba bungi bashintuluke. (Yes 11:6-9) Patudi tudienzeja bikole bua kumbusha kalukinu nansha kakese kadi mu muoyo wetu, tudi tuleja mutudi bidikiji ba Nzambi.—Ef 5:1, 2.
NUTANGILE FILME WA JOHNY NE GIDEON: BALUISHI KALE, LELU BANA BA MUNTU. PASHISHE NUANDAMUNE NKONKO EYI:
Bua tshinyi dilongesha dia Yehowa ndipite bionso bidi bantu benza bua kujikija kasungasunga ne lukinu?
Ntshinyi tshidi tshikukemesha paudi utangila dîku dia bana betu dia pa buloba bujima?
Mmunyi mudi kulama buobumue buetu bua bena Kristo kutumbishisha Yehowa?

1-3. Yezu wakenza tshinyi pavuaye musangane banyanga ntempelo?
YEZU uvua unemeka bikole ntempelo wa mu Yelushalema bualu uvua mumanye tshivuaye uleja. Katshia ku kale, ntempelo uvua muaba munene wa ntendelelu mulelela pa buloba. Kadi ntendelelu uvuabu batendelela Yehowa Nzambi wa tshijila au uvua ne bua kuikala mukezuke ne wa tshijila. Mpindieu ela meji muvua Yezu mumvue pavuaye mufike mu ntempelo mu dia 10 ngondo wa Nisana mu 33 ne musangane ne: bakavua benda bamunyanga. Ntshinyi tshivuabu benz
... 
bua kulekela tshintu kampanda bua kuleja mutuvua banange Yehowa.” Bayidi ba Kristo ba lulamatu bavua ne disanka bua kuenza mashintuluka avua akengela ne kubenga kuenza bibilu bia mu ntendelelu wa bukoya. *—Yone 15:19; 17:14.
11. Mmunyi mutudi mua kuleja ne: tudi tutua Bukalenge bua Masiya nyama ku mikolo?
11 Balongi ba Bible ba lulamatu abu mbatushile tshilejilu tshimpe. Patudi tuela meji bua tshilejilu tshiabu, mbimpe tudiebeje ne: ‘Mmunyi mundi mmona buludiki budi Kasumbu kaludiki katupesha? N
...
Tshilejilu, mu 2013 kuvua bamanyishi 7965954 kadi, bantu bavua babuele mu Tshivulukilu tshia lufu lua Kristo bavua 19241252.
^ tshik. 18 Ditapulula dia mishipa mimpe ne mibi ki ndifuanangane ne dia mikoko ne mbuji to. (Mat. 25:31-46) Ditapulula peshi dilumbuluisha dia ndekelu dia mikoko ne mbuji nedienzeke mu dikenga dinene didi kumpala eku. Too ne tshikondo atshi, bonso badi bafuanangane ne mishipa mibi badi mua kupingana kudi Yehowa ne kubasangishabu mu bisumbu bidi bienze bu bisaka.—Mal. 3:7.

Akulejahu dehi nsañu yakujinda?— * Bayibolu yahoshaña hakajindilu kadimena katenañawu nawu ‘kajindilu kajila.’ Aka kajindilu kajila muloña hikajindilu kaNzambi. Nawa akitenaña nawu kajindilu muloña antu hiyakilukiluku. Niañelu akeñeleña kwiluka yuma yayivulu kutalisha hanaka kajindilu. Wunakukeña wukiluki aka kajindilu?—
Wunatoñojoki neyi añelu akeñeleña kwiluka chumanyi?
Kushankulu, Nzambi waleñeli iyala nimumbanda watachi. Majinawu adiña Adama naEvu. Nzambi wayinkeli iluña dadiwahi dateneneñaw
... 
 nawu itempa daEdeni. Neyi Adama naEvu amwovwahilili Nzambi, wena nianyanawu adi kwilisha iseki dejima kwikala paradisa neyi dina itempa. Nawa adi kushakama muParadisa haya nyaka. Wunakwanuka chuma cheliluwu aAdama naEvu?—
Adama naEvu adikañili naNzambi, dichikwabulila paradisa makonu. Ilaña Nzambi wahosheli nindi wakawahisha iseki dejima, dichi antu akashakama haya nyaka nawa amuzañalu. Wakadiwahisha ñahi? Hadi yaaka yayivulu, antu elukili wanyi. Kadiña hikajindilu.
Chenjiliyi Yesu hamaseki, wa
...
jeleña antu yuma yayivulu kutalisha hanaka kajindilu. Wahosheli nindi hikajindilu kahosha haWanta waNzambi. Yesu walejeleña antu nindi alombeña nawu iwu Wanta winzi. Wakabalumuna iseki kwikala paradisa yayiwahi.
Wunazañalali hakwiluka aka kajindilu?— Watela kwanuka neyi antu amwovwahilaña Yehova diwu hohu akashakama muParadisa. Bayibolu yatulejeña nsañu yayivulu yawamayala nawambanda amwovwahilili Yehova. Wunakukeña kuyiluka?— Tuhanjekenu hadi antu antesha kulonda twiluki chitwatela kuyimbujola.

Mu bikondo bia kale Bantu bavua bakengeshibua bikole. Bakalomba misangu ya bungi bua Nzambi abasungile, kadi kakuvua muntu nansha umue uvua mulue kubasungila to. Bantu aba bavua bena Isalele, tshisamba tshia Nzambi tshia mu bikondo bia kale. Bavua babakengesha kudi tshisamba tshia bena Ejipitu tshivua ne bukole bua bungi. (Ekesode 1:13, 14) Bena Isalele bakindila munda mua bidimu bia bungi bua Nzambi kujikija tshikisu tshia bena mu Ejipitu. Ndekelu wa bionso, dîba divua Nzambi mulongolole diakak
... 
e lutulu luonso tshikondo tshivua Nzambi musungule bua kuluangana ne bantu babi bavua babanyunguluke. Kabavua mua kutuadija mvita ayi mu bobu nkayabu to, bavua ne bua kuindila too ne pavua dîba dikumbana. Pavuabu badienzela malu, Nzambi kavua ubatangila kabidi to. Bible udi uleja ne: Pavua bena Isalele baluangana mvita ivua Nzambi kayi mubanyishile, bavua misangu yonso bapeta bipeta bibi. *
NZAMBI KATU USANKA BUA LUFU LUA BANTU, NANSHA LUA BANTU BABI. Muoyo mmufumine kudi Yehowa Nzambi ne yeye k
...
bi kayi mumuanyishile, bualu ebu buakamufikisha ku lufu.—2 Kulondolola 35:20-24.
^ tshik. 8 Bena Isalele kabavua baleje bena Kanana ditalala kumpala kua kuluangana nabu mvita to. Bua tshinyi? Bualu Nzambi uvua mushile bena Kanana bidimu 400 bua balekele malu abu mabi. Pakalua bena Isalele kuluangana nabu mvita, bena Kanana mu tshibungi kabavua balekele malu abu mabi to. (Genese 15:13-16) Nunku, bavua ne bua kubabutula butubutu. Kadi, bena Kanana bavua bashintuluke bakapanda.—Yoshua 6:25; 9:3-27.

Bualu budi bulonda ebu, mmuyuki udi Ntemu wa Yehowa mua kuenza ne muntu kampanda. Tutekabi ne: Ntemu wa Yehowa udi ne dîna ne: Melanie udi uya kumbelu kua muntu mukaji mukuabu diende Charli.
“TUNGUNUKAYI NE KUENZA NUNKU BUA KUMVULUKA”
Melanie: Charli wetuawu. Mvua ne disanka dia bungi bua kukumona mu Tshivulukilu tshia lufu lua Yezu lumingu lushale. * Uvua mumone bishi tshibilu atshi?
Charli: Mvua musanke bua kuikalamu, kadi mu kuamba kuimpe tshivua mumvue bimpe bionso bivuabu bambamu to. Nkadi 
... 
i kashete kabondakane anyi?
Charli: Eyowa, kemuikalawu.
Melanie: Bia muomumue, pavua Adama ne Eva basungule bua kutombokela Nzambi, “bakabondakana” anyi bakanyanguka bua bubi ne dipanga bupuangane. Bu muvuabu balue bena mibi kumpala kua kulelabu bana, bana babu bonso bavua ne bua kuledibua pabu babondakane. Bavua ne bua kuledibua bonso mu bubi. Mu Bible, muaku “bubi” kawena uleja anu tshienzedi patupu to, kadi udi uleja kabidi nsombelu utudi bapiane. Tshipeta tshia ndekelu tshidi ne: nansha mutu
...
u wa lufu lua Yezu bua kuvuluka mulambu wende. Tshidimu etshi, mufikilu wa lufu luende eu newikale mu ditanu dia 3 ngondo 4.
^ tshik. 32 Tshiena-bualu tshikuabu tshia mu biena-bualu ebi netshileje mudi mulambu wa Yezu udi upikula utupandisha ku bubi, ne tshitudi ne bua kuenza bua kutuambuluishawu.
^ tshik. 36 Bilondeshile Bible, Nzambi ne Yezu mbantu babidi bashilangane. Bua kumanya malu makuabu, bala nshapita 4 wa mukanda wa Bible utu ulongesha tshinyi menemene? mupatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa.

- Kinshasa:Nvula uvua muloka mu dinda dia lelu mu tshimenga tshia kinshasa ivua mukeba embouteillages mukola ne mayi kuhula mu misusu.
- Kinshasa:Katshia butuku bua kutshia lelu , bantu bavua bapatika mu nujiu wa mashinyi ku mbanza ngungu bakadi bafika mu cliniques Ngaliema, mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa.
- Bukavu: Nsombelu wa bantu bavua benzela bibi ku minembwe kena muimpa to mu mikuna yak u Fizi ne MINEMBWE ku Sud-Kivu.
- Kinshasa:Nsombelu wa bena tshimuangi ba ditunga muela mu tshialu mu tshifufu tshidi tshituadija lelu mu ditunga dia congo tshikungija bena HCR,CCIR ,UA ne bakuabu .
- Goma: Ditunga dia congo didi didifila pamua ne matunga 9 addi madia nenda mutumba bua kuluisha disama dia ebola .
- Bunia:Mu Ituri, tshiluilu tshia ditunga ntshikuata ba ntoboji batua ku dikumi badibu bamba ne ba mai mai batua ku dikumi mu misoku mishila shilangana ya mu territoire wa Mambasa, pa km 170 ku mutu kua Bunia.
- Kinshasa: kunyima kua ngondu 18 ya mudimu general Elias Rodriguez wajikiji mudimu wenda mu ditunga dia congo . tshibilu tshinena tshivua tshilongolola lelu bua kumuela tuasakidila bua bidiyi muenza mu ditunga dia congo .

“Tudi ne dishindika dia kuikala ne kondo ka muoyo kalulame, bualu tudi basue kuenda mu bululame mu malu onso.”—Ebelu 13:18.
Muaku wa mu tshiena Greke udibu bakudimuna imue misangu mu Bible ne: “bululame” udi umvuija ku muaku ku muaku “tshintu kampanda tshimpe menemene.” Udi kabidi mua kuikala umvuija tshintu kampanda tshitudi mua kuangata mu mushindu muimpe.
Bena Kristo badi balonda mêyi a mupostolo Paulo mafundisha ku nyuma wa Nzambi aa: “Tudi basue kuenda mu bululame mu malu onso.” Abi bidi bi
... 
na meji mu malu au ne tutumikila mibelu idimu, tudi mua kulongesha muoyo wetu bua kuikalawu ne bululame ne buakane.
Bushuwa, pa kumbusha kutshimuna mvita ya dipanga bululame ne kupeta dimanya dijalame dia malu adi mu Bible, kudi malu makuabu a bungi a kuenza. Nansha nanku, tudi mu bulongolodi bunyanguke budi butusaka bua kuitaba mikenji yabu mibi. Ke bua tshinyi tudi ne bua kusambila Nzambi bua atuambuluishe ne atukuatshishe. ...

Kuikala ne bululame mu bulongolodi budi kabuyi ne bululame ebu kudi kulomba dikima. Kadi ku ndekelu, bantu nebatueyemene ne nebatunemeke.”—Kaori, wa mu Japon.

Bintu bia kale bidibu bapete bidiku bijadika miyuki ya mu Bible anyi?
Tshiena-bualu tshikuabu tshivua tshipatuke mu mukanda kampanda tshidi tshiamba ne: makebulula adibu benze mu bintu bia kale adi aleja ne: bantu “batue ku 50” badibu batele mu Mifundu ya tshiena Ebelu bavuaku bushuwa. Mu bantu aba mudi bakalenge 14 ba mu Yuda ne mu Isalele ne bamue bantu badi bamanyike bimpe bu mudi: Davidi ne Hizikiya ne bavua kabayi batambe kumanyika bu mudi: Menahema ne Peka. Munkatshi muabu muvua kabidi ba 
... 
tu biangula muinshi mua buloba bia bungi bidi bijadika ne: bantu bu mudi: Heloda, Pontio Pilato, Tibeliyo, Kayifa ne Sêgio Paulo bavuaku.
Ndîba kayi divua ntambue mijimine mu bitupa bia maloba bidi Bible utela?
Nansha mukadi nyama ya ntambue kayitshiyi mu bisuku bia muaba udi Buloba bunsantu lelu eu, mvese mitue ku 150 ya mu Bible idi yakula bua nyama eu idi ileja ne: bafundi ba Bible bavua bamanye bimpe ntambue. Mu mvese ya bungi mbatele ntambue mu ngumvuilu wa mu tshimfuanyi; kadi mikuabu idi 
...
ne bayinemeka, bavua batamba kuyizola ku bintu biabu. Bavua bayizola ku bibumba bua kulengeja njila wa kuenzela ngendu ya mazengu mu Babilona.
Badi bamba ne: ntambue yakanyema mu Palestine bua mvita ivua mienzeke ku ndekelu kua bidimu bia 1100 B.B. Bidi bimueneka ne: ntambue ikavua yenda ijimina miaba ayi panyima pa tshidimu tshia 1300. Nansha nanku, mu Mezopotamiya ne mu Suliya batshivua anu bakula bualu buayi too ne mu bidimu bia 1800, nansha mu ditunga dia Iran ne dia Irak mu bidimu bia 1900.

- Bunia:Mu Ituri, mpitadi yonsu mikanga katshia ku dia lumingu dishala mu localité wa Lwemba territoire wa Mambasa kunyima kua dishipa dia kamona kamba kudi bantu bikala ne bia lufu ku bianza badi babenega diluisha disama dia ebola .
- Bunia:, balombodi ba wa kabukulu wa Lori udi ukungija tshisamba tshia ba Lendu udi ulomba kudi ba mambala babu badi ne bingoma ku bianza bua kuya kudilambula kudi balombodi .
- Goma:Ku Nord-Kivu, ba tshipuita 28 ba mu polovense ba mu territoire wa Beni-Lubero badi batua mudimu udi tshiluilu tshia ditunga tshienza mpanda .
- Lubumbashi:Lelu ki udibu batuadija disumbisha dia matala avua masumba mu matunga a mu africa wa kuinshi .
- Kinshasa:Bena ditunga dia Serbie badi bajinga bua kulua kuenza mudimu mu ditunga dia congo mu malu a madimi .
- Kisangani:Mu Province wa Haut-Uele, meku matua ku nkama itanu adi alala pambelu bua nvula yidi ivua iloka matuku mashala .

...

Fuanyikija muledi udi uyukila ne muanende wa balume wa bidimu muanda mutekete. Udi wambila muana ne: “Kukadi bidimu bipite bungi, Nzambi wakafuka buloba ne bintu bionso bidimu, kufukaye dîba, ngondo ne mitoto.” Muana udi wela meji ndambu bua bualu ebu, pashishe webeja ne: “Papa, kadi uvua mufuke Nzambi nganyi?”
Muledi udi wandamuna muana ne: “Kakuena muntu uvua mufuke Nzambi to. Uvuaku katshi kuonso eku.” Diandamuna edi didi mua kusankisha muana dîba adi. Kadi padiye wenda ukola, lukonko elu lud
... 
 tuetu katuyi tujingulula bualu ebu bimpe bua bungi bua bidimu. Neikale anu koku nansha mu matuku atshilualua. (Buakabuluibua 1:8) Nunku, dikalaku diende tshiendelele nngikadilu wende munene wa Bukole buende buonso.
Bua tshinyi mbikole bua tuetu kumvua bualu ebu? Bualu muoyo wetu muîpi udi wenza bua kuikale dishilangana dinene mu mushindu utudi tumona bungi bua matuku ne mudi Yehowa uamona. Bu mudi Nzambi muikale wa tshiendelele, matuku tshinunu adi anu bu dituku dimue. (2 Petelo 3:8) Tuangata t
...
lu kuikalaku. (Yobo 38:4, 7; Kolosayi 1:15) Bidi biumvuika patoke ne: uvuaku nkayende kumpala. Kavua mufukibue kudi muntu kampanda to; bualu kakuvua tshintu anyi muntu ne muoyo kumpala kuende uvua mua kumufuka to.
Dikalaku dietu ne dia diulu ne buloba didi dileja muvuaku Nzambi wa tshiendelele. Muntu udi muenze bua bintu bionso bidi mu diulu bikala binyungakana ne udi muele mukenji udi ubilombola, uvua ne bua kuikalaku kuonso eku. Yeye ke udi mulue kupesha bintu bionso muoyo pashishe.—Yobo 33:4.

Uvuaku mubale bibejibeji bia Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi bishale ebi bimpe menemene anyi? Nanku, anji tangila ni udi mua kuandamuna nkonko idi ilonda eyi:
Padi bulongolodi bua Nzambi bufila buludiki, ntshinyi tshidi bana betu ba balume bu mudi batangidi ba bijengu ne bakulu mu tshisumbu ne bua kuenza?
Badi ne bua kutumikila ne lukasa luonso. Badi mua kudiebeja ne: ‘Ntuku ngambuluisha bena Kristo nanyi bua kuikalabu bashindame mu nyuma anyi? Ntuku ndonda diakamue buludiki butudi tupeta kudi bulongol
... 
ua ndekelu bufikisha ku muoyo ne ditalala.—w16.12, dib. 15-17.

Sungula malu a kuteka pa muaba wa kumpala adi makumbane, tekemena malu malelela, keba dituku dionso tshikondo tshia kushala mupuwe, bandila bufuki bua Nzambi, ikala wela bilele, ikala ne tshibidilu tshia kuibidija mubidi ne lala tulu tukumbane.—w16.12, dib. 22-23.
“Bakumbusha Henoka kumuteka muaba mukuabu bua kamonyi lufu.” (Eb. 11:5) Mushindu kayi?
Bidi bimueneka ne: Nzambi wak
...
adika dituvua bangate. Nzambi wakashintulula dipangadika divuaye muangate bua Niniwe pavua bantu banyingalale bua mpekatu yabu. Ku misangu, nsombelu mipiamipia anyi bualu kampanda bupiabupia budi mua kutulomba bua kushintulula petu dipangadika.—w17.03, dib. 16-17.
Bua tshinyi kuakula bibi bua bakuabu kudi ne njiwu ya bungi?
Kudi mua kunyangakaja tshilumbu bikole kakutshiyi mushindu wa kutshijikija. Nansha tuetu babinge anyi bapile, kuakula mêyi adi atapa kakuena kuakaja malu to.—w17.04, dib. 21.

Kunyima kua matuku muanda mutekete a dienza mudimu wa dilongesha bantu bua difutu diaTshisanji tshinene tshia televizion tshia ditunga dia Congo (RTNC) ne Kuenza mudimu pamue ni Africa Union Financial Services (AUFS), balombodi ba provense batue ku dikumi bavua bakidibua kudi Patrick Muyaya, Ministre wa malu a diyukidilangana ne bikandakanda mu biro biende lelu Wa Dibidi dia matuku muanda mutekete ngondo muisatu wa 2023.
Balombodi aba ba mu province yonso ya congo wa mungalata bavua ne Sylvie El
... 
nabi mudimu bikadi bikulakaje, ne tudi ne bua kulama bintu bia kale bia Radio ne televizion ya ditunga dia Congo bua kukeba bikuabu. Tuvua bayukila kabidi bua mushindu wa balombodi betu ne bena mudimu betu bonso kuya muaba mukuabu”, ke muvua Max César Lokate, mulombodi wa Tshopo muambe.
“Tuvua bayukile ne bamfumu betu bua malanda avua ne bua kuikala pankatshi pa bakokeshi ba provense ne bamfumu ba miaba ya dilamina mashinyi. Bualu tudi tumona ne: bikala malu onso enda bimpe ku mutu kua bakokeshi
...
uyaya muteleje ne mulaye bua kuambila bamfumu bende, nangananga mfumu wa ditunga Félix Antoine Tshisekedi ne mfumu wa ditunga Jean-Michel Sama Lukonde.
Bamfumu aba bavua ne disanka dia bungi bua muvuabu babuele mu tshilongelu tshinene. Badi kabidi basue kuenza mudimu pamue ne balombodi ba biro bia benji ba midimu bonso bua kulongolola malu. Bualu bena Kongo bonso badi ne bua kuanji kumanya malu bimpe ku diambuluisha dia bikandakanda biabu, nangananga bia mbulamatadi.

Tshitendelelu ntshintu tshienza kudi bantu anyi?
BAMUE BANTU BADI BELA MEJI NE: tshitendelelu ntshintu tshienza kudi bantu; bakuabu badi bamba bobu ne: Nzambi udi ukoka bantu kudiye ku diambuluisha dia tshitendelelu. Kadi wewe udi wela meji kayi?
TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA
Kudi “ntendelelu udi mukezuke ne kayi munyanguke ku mêsu kua Nzambi wetu ne Tatu.” (Yakobo 1:27) Tshitendelelu tshikezuke anyi tshilelela tshidi tshifumina kudi Nzambi.
MMALU KAYI MAKUABU ATUDI TULONGA MU BIBLE?
Bua tshitendelelu kusankishatshi Nzambi, tshidi ne bua kuangatshila malongesha atshi mu Bible.—Yone 4:23, 24.
Bitendelelu bidi bimanyine pa ngenyi ya bantu mbia mafi.—Mâko 7:7, 8.
Bidiku ne mushinga bua kuikala mu tshitendelelu kampanda anyi?
UDI MUA KUANDAMUNA BISHI?
Eyowa
Tòo
Bilondeshile muntu ne muntu
TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA
“Tutabalelanganayi muntu ne muntu bua kusakangana ku dinanga ne ku bienzedi bimpe, katuyi tulekela kudisangisha kuetu pamue.” (Ebelu 10:24, 25) Nzambi mmusue bua batendeledi bende benze tshisumbu tshimue tshilongolola.
MMALU KAYI MAKUABU ATUDI TULONGA MU BIBLE?
Aba badi batendelela Nzambi muaba umue badi ne bua kuikala ne ditabuja dimue.—1 Kolinto 1:10, 11.
Bena mu tshitendelelu tshidi Nzambi wanyisha badi benza dîku dia pa buloba bujima.—1 Petelo 2:17.

MABEJI A TSHISANGILU TSHIA NSOMBELU NE MUDIMU WETU WA BUENA KRISTO Ngondo 4 2017
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Muntu yonso udi ubuela mu bisangilu udi ne bua kumona dinanga dia buena Kristo mu tshienzedi. Mmunyi muudi mua kuenza bua ku Nzubu wa Bukalenge kuikale musangelu ne dinanga?
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Mu Yelemiya nshapita wa 24, Yehowa wakafuanyikija bantu ne tumuma tua mfigi. Mbanganyi bavua bu tumuma tua mfigi tuimpe ne mmunyi mutudi mua kubidikija lelu?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Bantu badi balekele bisangilu anyi kuyisha batshidi anu ne mushinga kudi Yehowa Nzambi. Mmunyi mutudi mua kubambuluisha bua kupinganabu mu tshisumbu?
TUIKALAYI NE NSOMBELU WA BUENA KRISTO
Kuimba misambu ya Bukalenge kuakakolesha bana betu mu buloko bua mu Sachsenhausen. Misambu eyi idi mua kutukolesha petu patudi kumpala kua ntatu.
BIUMA BIA MU DÎYI DIA NZAMBI
Ndishilangana kayi didi pankatshi pa tshipungidi tshipiatshipia ne tshia mikenji ne mmunyi mudi mabenesha atshi mikale a kashidi?

Buakane bulelela nebuikalaku pa buloba apa anyi?
Udi mua kuandamuna bishi?
Eyowa
Tòo
Pamuapa
Tshidi Bible wamba
‘Ndi mumanye ne: Yehowa neabingishe muena dikenga pamulumbuluishabu, nealumbuluile bapele biakane.’ (Misambu 140:12) Bukalenge bua Nzambi nebulue ne buakane bulelela pa buloba.
Mmalu kayi makuabu atudi tulonga mu Bible?
Nzambi udi umona dipanga kulumbulula kuakane didi lelu pa buloba, ne neadilongolole.—Muambi 5:8.
Buakane bua kudi Nzambi nebulue ne ditalala ne bukubi pa buloba.—Yeshaya 32:16-18.
Nzambi udiku wanyisha tshisumbu kampanda tshia bantu kupita tshikuabu anyi?
Bamue bantu badi bamba ne: Nzambi mmubeneshe tshisumbu tshia bantu kampanda anyi mmutshiele mulawu, eku bakuabu bamba ne: Nzambi udi wangata bantu bonso mushindu umue. Wewe udi wela meji kayi?
Tshidi Bible wamba
“Nzambi kena ne kansungansunga to, kadi udi witaba muntu wa mu tshisamba tshionso udi umutshina, udi wenza malu makane.” (Bienzedi 10:34, 35) Ku mêsu kua Nzambi bantu bonso badi mushindu umue.
Mmalu kayi makuabu atudi tulonga mu Bible?
Bible udi ne “lumu luimpe” bua “ditunga dionso, tshisamba tshionso, muakulu wonso ne bantu bonso.”—Buakabuluibua 14:6.

N’Djamena, tshimenga tshikulu tshia ditunga dia Tchad, ke muaba uvua tshisangilu tshia kumpala tshia mpuilu wa 46 tshia Union parlementaire africain tshiakatuadija mu dia 5 ngondo wa dikumi 2024, mu nzubu wa Palais de la démocratie.
Bena mu tshisumbu tshinene tshia mu ditunga dia Congo bavua balombola kudi Mulombodi munene wa kabadi kakulu ka ditunga Omana Bitika Pascal.
Mu dia matuku muanda mutekete ngondo wa dikumi, mulombodi wa wa mu Sénat wakakula mu dîna dia ditunga dia Congo ne wakavuluija kumpala malu adi mulombodi wa ditunga Félix Antoine Tshisekedi muenze bua kupingaja ditalala pankatshi pa ditunga dia RDC ne dia Rwanda, ditunga dia RDC didi mu mvita idi kayiyi miakane idi mishipeshe bantu bapite pa miliyo 10 ne mishipeshe bantu binunu ne binunu badi kabayi mua kuya kuabu ne bakaji ba bungi badibu bakuate ku bukole.
Wakalomba kabidi bua kukolesha malu a mpungilu bua kujadika ditalala mu tshitupa tshia Grand Lacs, ne wakangata dipangadika bua kupingaja ditalala mu ditunga dia RDC mu luapolo luende lua ndekelu.
» ditunga dietu didi ditungunuka ne kuluangana mvita ya tshikisu idi kayiyi miakane idi Rwanda muteke, idi mishipeshe bantu binunu ne binunu ne ipambuisha bantu mu nzubu yabu » , yeye kuamba.
Tudi bamanye kabidi ne: Mulombodi munene wa Sénat, Omana Bitika Pascal, wakamanyisha kabidi dilomba dia ditunga dia RDC bua kulongolola tshisangilu tshidi tshilonda tshia Union parlementaire africain.

William Shakespeare udi muenji wa manayi, mufundi ni munayi muena anglais, mutambushibue mu dia matuku makumi abidi ne asambombo ngondu wa tshisanga nkasu tshidimu tshia tshinunu nkama itanu makumi asambombo ne inayi mu Stratford-upon-Avon ni mufua mu dia matuku makumi abidi ne isatu ngondu wa tshisanga nkasu tshidimu tshia tshinunu nkama isambombo dikumi ne isambombo mu tshimenga tshia momumue. Muinyika dîna dia  >, > eshi  >,udi umua wa bêdi ba kashala ba bikuji ni benji ba manayi mu mwakulu wa anglais.Mikandà yenda, mikudimunà mu miakulu ya bunyi,idi ni mánayî makumi asatu ne tshitemba, bikasa lukama makumi atanu ne inayi ni ndambu wa tusala tua ntentamu tuvu tumumpesha mu mushindu muakana.

Munkatshi mua bidimu binayi bia dikeba dia bena lukinu biivi, mvita ivuabu baluishe tshisumbu tshia bivi ba makuta a mbulamatadi mu ditunga dia Congo ne bena mafi a bende ba mu matunga a ku mputu.
Bualu ebu buakajula munda mua bena midimu bonso ba ditunga dijima, dijinga dia kulombola malu a mbulamatadi kakuyi buivi to.
Mu bidimu binayi ebi, mushindu udi biro bia malu a mpetu bienza mudimu , IGF mmusake ditunga dia Congo bua kubanda mu muaba dikumi n’itangu mu mulongo wa matunga adi akokesha bua kuluisha dikosa dia mishiku.
Gloire Kabongo

1. Nzambi uvua mulongolole Isalele wa kale bua tshinyi?
Nzambi uvua mulongolole ndelanganyi ya Abalahama bua yenze tshisamba tshimue, yeye kubapesha mikenji. Wakasungula tshisamba tshia “Isalele,” kutshivuijaye muaba wa ntendelelu wende mulelela, kutshipeshaye dîyi diende. (Musambu 147:19, 20) Nunku, bisamba bionso bia pa buloba bivua mua kupetela diakalenga kudi tshisamba tshia Isalele.—Bala Genese 22:18.
Nzambi wakasungula bena Isalele bua kuikalabu bamanyi anyi bantemu bende. Malu avua mafiki
... 
a muomumue wa dilonga malu a mu Bible mu bisangilu biabu pa buloba bujima.—Bala Ebelu 10:24, 25.
3. Bulongolodi bua Bantemu ba Yehowa bua matuku etu aa buakatuadija mushindu kayi?
Mu bidimu bia 1870, kasumbu kampanda ka balongi ba Bible kakatuadija kupetulula malongesha malelela a mu Bible. Bakajingulula ne: Yezu uvua mulongolole tshisumbu tshia bena Kristo bua kuyisha. Ke bualu kayi bakatuadija kuyisha lumu luimpe lua Bukalenge bua Nzambi pa buloba bujima. Mu 1931, bakangata dîna dia Bantemu ba
...
bantu ku nzubu ne ku nzubu. (Bienzedi 20:20) Tudi kabidi tulomba bantu badi banange malu a Nzambi ne muoyo umue bua kulonga nabu Bible. Kadi Bantemu ba Yehowa kabena amu bulongolodi patupu to. Tudi mu dîku didi ne Tatu muimpe udi ne dinanga dia bungi. Tudi bana ba muntu, tutu tuambuluishangana. (2 Tesalonike 1:3) Bu mudibu balongolole batendeledi ba Yehowa bua kusankisha Nzambi ne kuambuluisha bantu bakuabu, bobu ke dîku didi ne disanka dilelela pa buloba apa.—Bala Misambu 33:12; Bienzedi 20:35.

Mukelenge wakamana kuambila balongi bandi dikumi ne babidi ne : « nuenu kabidi nudi nungamba bualu bua nuakadi nanyi ku tshibangidilu ne katataka » (Yone 15. 27). Ke tshidi mupostolo wenza apa. Tshiena bualu tshiandi tshidi muoyo wa tshiendelele diambedi « wakunvuibua », « kumonyibua », ne « kulengibua » mu Muana, udi kataka muambibue kudi bakangata ku ditabusha bukole bua kubikidibua ne bana ba Nzambi
(Yone 1. 12). Bidi bikengela kutapulula malanda a kuikala muana (eu udi ngi
... 
ila tumanye mua kuandamunaku.
Mu mv. 9, bena kuitabusha bakuabu badi mua kuamba ne kabena ne muoyo wa Nzambi bualu bua badi bafikila bua kuenza bibi (tangila shap. 5. 18). Tumanye bimpe ne, mubidi anyi meme (moi) mulelela wa muena kuitabusha udi, muntu mupia-mupia ne eu kena mua kuenza bubi nansha.
Kutapulula kua bukua bantu mu bana ba Nzambi ne mu bana ba diabulu kudi kujadikibue mu mv. 7-12 (fuany. Yone 8. 44). Lelu mu miaba ya ntendelelu ya bungi kabena bamanye ditapuluka edi nansha. Bikalaku
...
duisha muntu mupia-mupia udi munda muetu. Ku luende luseke (Satana) udi utupesha mpingu ya bungi, mikumbane bua kuteta mitshima yetu ya bu muntu. Tuetu bana ba Nzambi, tulame dinanga dietu dikale anu kudi Mukelenge (mv. 21 ; 1 Kol. 10. 14).

‘Bakalua kubikila Abalahama ne: “Mulunda wa Yehowa.”’

BANTU batu bamba ne: “Nkashama katu ulela munga nyama.” Bushuwa, bana ba bungi batu bafuana baledi babu bikole. Kadi, tatu ne mamu batu basambulujila bana babu ngikadilu yabu. Yehowa Tatu wetu wa mu diulu ke Mufidi wa muoyo. (Mus. 36:9) Bu mutudi bana bende, tudi bamufuane ku amue malu. Bu mudibu batufuke ku tshimfuanyi tshiende, tudi ne bukole bua kuela me
... 
lu onso? b) Bululame mbufikishe bantu bakuabu ku diamba tshinyi?
12 Badi bamanya batendeledi ba Yehowa ku bululame, kadi ki nku dienzela bantu malu mabi to. Mupostolo Paulo wakafunda ne: “Nutungunuke ne kusambila bua bualu buetu, bualu tudi ne dishindika dia kuikala ne kondo ka muoyo kalulame, bualu tudi basue kuenda mu bululame mu malu onso.” (Eb. 13:18) Bu mutudi badisuike bua “kuenda mu bululame mu malu onso,” katuena tukeba bua kupetela bintu kampanda pambidi pa bena Kristo netu to. .” (Filip. 4:6, 7) Tuanyishayiku misangu yonso “ditalala dia Nzambi” didi kadiyi kuelekeja didi dilama mioyo yetu ne lungenyi luetu.
21 Disambila didi dituambuluisha bua kudia bulunda ne Yehowa. Ke bua tshinyi, tuikalayi ‘tusambila misangu yonso.’ (1 Tes. 5:17) Dilonga dietu edi dikoleshaku malanda etu ne Nzambi ne dipangadika dietu dia kutumikila mikenji yende miakane. Tukebe kabidi dîba dia kuelangana meji bua masanka atudi tupeta bua mudi Yehowa muikale Tatu wetu, Nzambi wetu ne Mulunda wetu.

Peshi neapuekelele bua kushala bule bua muana ne kutuadija kuakula ne bupole mu buimpe? Bushuwa, muledi udi ne didipuekesha neasungule bua kuakula ne muanende mu mushindu muimpe.

Mabeji a tshisangilu tshia Nsombelu ne mudimu wetu wa buena Kristo | Ngondo 3 2018
●○○ DIYISHA MUNTU MUSANGU WA KUMPALA
Kampanye ka dibikila bantu mu Tshivulukilu (3-31/3): Tudi balue kukubikila bua ulue mu tshibilu tshia mushinga mukole. Kuata diebe dibeji dia dibikila. Mu Disambombo dia 31 ngondo muisatu, bantu miliyo ya bungi pa buloba bujima nebadisangishe bua kuvuluka lufu lua Yezu Kristo. Mu dibeji edi mbafunde dîba ne muaba wenzekela tshibilu etshi mu bitupa bietu ebi. Tudi tukubikila kabidi bua ulue kuteleja muyuki wa ne: “Yezu Kristo nnganyi?” wenzabu lumingu lumue kumpala kua Tshivulukilu etshi.
Musangu walonda: Bua tshinyi Yezu wakafua?

1. Ndishilangana kayi didi pankatshi pa bintu bitudi nabi dijinga ne bintu bitudi basue?
KUDI anu bintu bikese patupu bitudi nabi dijinga bua kuikala ne muoyo. Tshilejilu, tudi dijinga ne biakudia, bia kuvuala ne muaba wa kusomba. Kadi bintu bitudi basue kabiena biobi ne ndekelu to. Bantu ba bungi kabatu bajingulula ne: bintu bionso bidibu basue ki mbitubu nabi dijinga menemene to.

...
unga bua kuakula bua malu a ditunga dietu, bua malu a mpetu wetu ne bua nsombelu utudi nende”.
André Wameso wakamba kabidi ne: Mfumu wa ditunga, Félix Tshisekedi, mmuangate dipangadika dia kujikija tshilumbu etshi bua kashidi. Nansha mudibu bashilangane mu malu a tshididi, Mulombodi wa Kabinete wa Mulombodi wa ditunga udi utangila malu a mpetu ne a mpetu, udi ulomba bua bumvuangane bua kupingaja bumfumu bua ditunga, nangananga mu tshipungidi etshi ne Mulombodi wa ditunga.

nga didiye nadi bua kutuambuluisha ne bukole buende bua kuenza nanku. ‘Kusambila misangu yonso’ nunku kudi kuleja ne: tudi ne ditabuja dilelela.

Ditabuja ntshinyi menemene? Ditabuja didi dilomba ‘kufika ku dimanya’ Nzambi bu muntu mulelela. (Yone 17:3) Bua kuenza nanku bidi bilomba tshia kumpala kupeta meji a Nzambi ku diambuluisha dia Bible. Tudi bamanye ne: udi umona yonso wa kutudi ne mmusue kutuambuluisha. Kadi ditabuja dilelela kadiena dimanyina 
...
u mabi” to. Kadi udi upesha bantu bonso meji ne “muoyo mujima” ne udi ufila “bukole budi bupite bua pa tshibidilu” bua kutuambuluisha bua kupita bimpe ne ntatu yetu.
Kadi tudi mua kuenza tshinyi bituikala tuditatshisha bualu muoyo wetu udi mu njiwu?

1, 2. Bua tshinyi tudi mua kuamba ne: Yezu udi mulombodi udi ne meji?
FUANYIKIJABI ne: muntu kampanda mupiluke udi unulombola bua kumona tshimenga kampanda tshimpe tshitambe. Kutu muanji kufika mu tshimenga atshi ni nguewe ni mbantu banudi nabu, nunku nudi nulonda bualu buonso budiye unuambila. Imue misangu, wewe ne bantu banudi nuenza nabu luendu nudi nukema bua bimue bintu bimpe bidi mu tshimenga atshi binutu kanuyi banji kumona. Kadi panudi nuela muntu udi unulombola nkonko bua bintu abi, udi
... 
ia kumpala, kuvua bantu 144 000 bakokesha ne Kristo. Tshibidi, kuvua musumba munene. Tshikondo atshi, kuvua lungenyi lua ne: bena mu musumba munene aba bavua bena Kristo ba ku dîna batshivua mu bitendelelu bia bukua buena Kristo. Bavua ne ndambu wa ditabuja kadi kadiyi dikumbane bua kuangata dipangadika dia kushalabu ne lulamatu to. Nunku, bavua ne bua kubapesha muaba mushadidile mu diulu. Bua pa buloba, bavua bela meji ne: tshisumbu tshisatu tshivua tshia “bantu ba bunême” ba kale bavua ne lula
...
ulombola’ udi umvuija “kuleja njila.”

^ tshik. 10 Mu ngondo 6 mu 1880, Tshibumba tshia Nsentedi tshia Siona (Angl.) tshiakamba ne: bantu aba 144 000 bavua ne bua kuikala bena Yuda ba ku mubidi bavua mua kulua bena Kristo kutuadijila mu 1914. Ntshinyi tshiakuambuluisha bua kuanyisha dibala diebe dia Bible ne kusunamu malu a bungi? Mona ngenyi itanu ivua miambuluishe bantu ba bungi.
Keba muaba muimpe. Keba muaba mutalale. Epuka ditanaji bua umone mua kutuma meji ebe ku biudi ubala. Muaba mutoke udi kapepe katalale udi mua kukuambuluisha bua kupeta malu a bungi mu dibala diebe.
Ikala ne mmuenenu muimpe. Bu mudi Bible mukanda wa Tatu wetu wa mu diulu, neumanye malu a bungi adimu wewe udituala bu muana mukese udi musue kulonga malu kudi 
... 
. Mu Bible mudi ngenyi ya Nzambi, ke bua tshinyi tudi dijinga ne diambuluisha diende bua kumumvua bimpe. Nzambi mmulaye bua kupesha “badi bamulomba nyuma muimpe.” (Luka 11:13) Nyuma muimpe eu udi mua kukuambuluisha bua kumvua meji a Nzambi. Mu kupita kua matuku, neakuambuluishe bua kumvua “too ne malu male a Nzambi.”—1 Kolinto 2:10.
Bala bua kumvua. Kubadi anu bua kumana mabeji to. Ikala welangana meji ne muoyo mujima bua biudi ubala. Udiele nkonko bu mudi eyi: ‘Nngikadilu kayi indi mmona kudi m
...
ua kulonga bualu kampanda buikala mua kulengeja nsombelu webe. Udi mua kudifundila bipatshila bu mudi: ‘Ndi musue kulonga malu a bungi adi atangila Nzambi nkayende.’ ‘Ndi musue kulua muntu muimpe, mulume muimpe anyi mukaji muimpe.’ Pashishe, sungula bimue bitupa bia mu Bible biakuambuluishe bua kukumbaja bipatshila biebe ebi. *
Ngenyi itanu eyi neyikuambuluishe bua kutuadija. Kadi mmunyi muudi mua kuvuija dibala diebe bualu bua disanka? Tshiena-bualu tshidi tshilonda tshidi tshifila imue ngenyi.

...

Lahaba udi tshifuanyikiji tshia mukaji wa ditabuja dilelela, bienzedi biende bidi bileja ne ditabuja diende didi dilelela. (Tangila Yakobo 2:25). Lahaba kakapingana mu njila yende ya kale, wakapeta muaba munkatshi mua bantu ba Nzambi mu buloba bua mulayi (Yoshua 
...
tshiende; e, udi woluela bakengi bianza biende. Udi ubulula mukana muende ne meji, diyisha dia luse didi pa ludimi luende.
Udi utangila malu a ba mu nzubu muende benza, katuwadia bia kudia bia bufuba. Bana bende badi bajuka, badi bamuvudishila disanka. Bayende kabidi udi ujuka, udi umutumbisha ne, Bana bakaji bangi bakuenza bimpe, kadi wewe udi utamba buonso buabo. Komite munene wa tshisumbu tshia ndundu tshia mu Afrike (“CAF”) udi ufuma ku diamba matuku adibu ne bua kuenzesha ndundu udi mutambe kutangalaja mu Afrike mu ditunga dia Maroc mu tshidimu tshia 2025. Matuku avuabu bamanyishe aa:
Ditshimuna dia ntuadijilu: Dia lumingu, dia 21 ngondo wa dikumi ne muibidi 2025
Ndekelu wa bionso: Dia lumingu dia 18 ngondo wa 1 wa 2026.
Mu mushindu wa muomumue, Komite munene wa CAF wakamanyisha kabidi matuku a Mpuilu wa matunga a mu Afrike wa bakaji (“CAN Féminine”) wa CAF, udi wenda uya kumpala bikole ne neufike kabidi mu Maroc. Matuku a mpungilu wa CAN wa bakaji wa Total Energies Maroc 2024 adi:
Dituku dia tuandijilu : didi mu matuku 5 ngondo wa 7 wa 2024
Ndekelu wa bionso: Disambombo dia 26 ngondo wa 7 wa 2024
Mpuilu eyi idi ne mushinga wa bungi mu ndongoluelu wa ndundu wa mu Afrike, idi ikoka binunu ne binunu bia bantu badi banange ndundu eu ne banayi ba tshipedi ba mu Afrike mujima.
Bu muvua ditunga dia Maroc dikale ditunga divua ne bua kuibaka tshipalu tshia ndundu, divua ne bua kuleja dijinga dikole dia kunanga ndundu ne kufila bintu bia dikema bua bateleji.

Udi mumone muana wa bakaji udi mu tshimfuanyi etshi anyi?— Mmuana wa muntu uvuabu babikila ne: Yefeta. Mukanda wa Nzambi ki mmutuleje dîna diende to, kadi tshitudi bamanye ntshia se: uvua musankishe tatuende ne Yehowa kabidi. Tuanji tumonabi malu adi amutangila yeye ne tatuende Yefeta.
Yefeta uvua muntu muimpe; uvua wangata kabidi dîba dia bungi bua kulongesha muanende wa bakaji malu a Yehowa. Uvua kabidi muntu wa makanda a bungi ne mulombodi muimpe wa bantu. Nunku, bena Isalele bakamulomba bua 
... 
la musombele anu ku nzubu wa tshitendelelu wa Nzambi wenzelaku mudimu matuku ende onso a muoyo. Nzubu wa tshitendelelu au uvua muaba uvua bantu baya bua kutendelela Nzambi tshikondo atshi. Nunku, Yefeta wakatshimuna mvita ayi! Udi mumanye muntu wa kumpala uvua mupatuke mu nzubu bua kumuakidila pakapinganaye kuende anyi?—
Eyowa, mmuanende wa bakaji! Pende ke muana umuepele uvua nende Yefeta, mpindieu uvua ne dibanza dia kumutuma muaba wa kule. Bualu ebu buakabungamija Yefeta bikole. Pende si ukav
...
mba kujinga yeye bua kukumbaja dilaya dia tatuende ne kusankisha Yehowa. Abu ke bualu buvuaye mutambe kuangata ne mushinga mupite wa kusedibua anyi kulela bana. Nunku wakumbuka kuabu, yeye kuya kusombela ku nzubu wa tshitendelelu matuku ende onso a muoyo.
Buebe wewe, tshivuaye muenze atshi tshivuaku tshisankishe tatuende ne Yehowa anyi?— Eyowa, tshivua tshibasankishe! Wewe utumikila, kabidi munange ne Yehowa, neufuane muana wa bakaji wa Yefeta. Wewe pebe neusankishe baledi bebe ne Yehowa kabidi.

Bana betu ba bajila Kasanga,
Nanga nanga mu diku kia muana wa kumpala wa Kasanga, mbuena kuamba "Muanza Mande Kanyoka", anyi bakua Kanyoka ni Mfumu wabu wa ka bukulu Nsabanga, nansha kumutu kuende kuikale Mfumu Nsapu (bualu yeyi biende udi mu diku dia bakua Kanyoka), ni bena Beene, mmumue ni ndelanganyi ya Ndambala Beene, umue wa ku bana ba Muanza Mande Kanyoka, ni bena kabesa, nyinkende wa Mwange, ni Kându, ni Nsase, ni Ilunga (bakwa Ilunga mua Lubuelu), nungambileku, bua badi bamanye, bakulu ni bakunyi ba Muange Luamana. bandi même mumanye badi : Muange Luamana, wa ba Nsase, ni Kându Nkuba, ni Ilunga.
Udiku mumanye bana babu bakuabu atufundile ni mudibu balondangane. Tuasakidila wa mansa tente.

1, 2. Bua tshinyi bantu ba bungi kabatshitu batamba kunemeka mikenji? Tudi mua kuenza bishi bua kunanga mikenji ya Nzambi?
“MIKENJI ntshina tshidi katshiyi ne ndekelu, idi . . . ikongoloja malu onso.” Bavua bafunde mêyi aa mu mukanda kampanda mu 1712. Muafundi uvua unyingalala bua nkoselu wa bilumbu wa baladikija malu misangu mikuabu bidimu ne bidimu ku tubadi, babuejija ne bavua babifunde mu bulanda. Bantu mbabange kupetula mikenji mu matunga a bungi bualu malu a mikenji ne a bilumbu mmakodiaka
... 
 ne: “Mikenji ya Yehowa idi miakane tshishiki.” (Musambu 19:7) Anu bu muvuaye mumanye bimpe, mikenji ivua isakangana ku luse ne ku dienzelangana malu kakuyi kansungansunga. Mmushindu kayi?
14 Mu amue matunga lelu, bidi bimueneka ne: mikenji idibu bele itu itamba kutua ku tshia benzavi pamutu pa kuambuluisha badibu benzele bibi. Tshilejilu, bivi badi mua kuenza mu buloko matuku bungi kampanda; kadi eku bantu badibu bibe bashale kabayi ne bintu biabu, tshibi babafutshisha bitadi bua kufutshila nzu
...
nji tshivua tshia kulongesha. Ke bualu kayi, mukanda mukuabu udi uleja ne: muaku wa mu tshiena Ebelu wa tohrah udibu bakudimune ne: “mukenji” udi umvuija “dilongesha.”
^ tshik. 17 Bavua bele lukonko lua mushinga mu mikenji ne: ‘Mitshi idi bu bantu banudi nuluangana nabu anyi?’ (Dutelonome 20:19) Philon (mumanyi muena Yuda wa mu bidimu lukama bia kumpala) wakatela mukenji eu, kuambaye ne: Nzambi udi umona “bibi bua kuenzelabu bintu bidi kabiyi bienze bualu bubi malu a tshiji atubu benzela muntu.”

1, 2. Bua tshinyi Bible ndipa didi disankisha bikole didi Nzambi mutupeshe?
UTU umvua tshinyi padi mulunda webe ukupesha tshintu kampanda tshiuvua kuyi mutekemene? Udi utshikangula ne lukasa, ne usanka bua mudi mulunda webe mukuelele meji. Udi umuela tuasakidila bua tshidiye mukupeshe.
2 Bible ndipa didi Nzambi mutupeshe. Udi utuambila malu atudi katuyi mua kupeta muaba mukuabu. Tshilejilu, udi utuambila ne: Nzambi wakafuka diulu ne buloba ne mulume ne mukaji ba kumpala. Udi utupesha mêyi manene
... 
u ya mu Bible itshidi ituambuluisha too ne lelu. Yehowa mmumanye mutudi benjibue, nunku udi umvua mutudi tuela meji ne tudiumvua. Mmutumanye bimpe menemene kupita mutudi badimanye tuetu bine, ne mmusue bua tuikale ne diakalenga. Mmumanye tshidi tshimpe anyi tshibi buetu tuetu.
11, 12. a) Mmibelu kayi mimpe ivua Yezu mufile mu Matayi nshapita 5 too ne wa 7? b) Mmalu kayi makuabu adi Bible utulongesha?
11 Tudi tubala mu Matayi nshapita 5 too ne wa 7 mibelu mitambe buimpe ivua Yezu mufile ya mua ku
...
alu adi Bible wamba.
20 Bible udi bushuwa mukanda wa Nzambi. Mmusue bua ubale mukanda eu, uwulonge ne uwunange. Ikala ne dianyisha bua dipa edi, ne tungunuka ne kulonga Bible. Pashishe neujingulule tshidi Nzambi mulongoluele bantu. Mu nshapita udi ulonda, netulonge malu a bungi adi atangila dilongolola edi.
^ tshik. 6 Bamue bantu badi bamba ne: Bible kena umvuangana to, kadi ki mmuomu to. Bala nshapita wa 7 wa mukanda wa La Bible : Parole de Dieu ou des hommes ?, mupatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa.

Bible udi uleja patoke mudi Nzambi umona budiambike. Tudi tubalamu mêyi a Yezu a ne: ‘mbua Bukalenge bua mu diulu’ budi bamue bantu bashadila bajike anu bu yeye. Mukanda muibidi wakadi ubenga bua kuakidila badi kabayi batuala « dilongesha dia Kilisto ». Mukanda eu muisatu udi usengelela bena kuitabusha bua kuakidila ne kukuatshisha badi babalongesha (fuany. Yone 13. 20). Kutabalela bena mudimu ba mukelenge, nkukuatshisha Lumu luimpe
(nv. 8).
Badi batulesha bantu ba bungi mu mukanda eu muipi. Gayo muine wakatuminaye mukanda, wakadi munanga wandi wakadi mutshima wende udiunda, wakadi wenda mu bushua, wakadi ne lulamatu, dinanga diende diakadi dimanyike kudi bantu buonso. Demetelio, udibo batela kule kuaka, wakadi biende ne bumanyishi buimpe (1 Tim.
3. 7). Kadi kutangila Diotelefe, wakadi musue bua kuikala kumutu kua bakuabu (1 Pet. 5. 3), wakula mei mabi bua mupostolo, kayi wakididila bana babu, ne wipata bakuabu mu ekelesia. Yone udi ufunda bua bana babu bakuabu batangadiki « bakalupuka bua dina » (mv. 7 ; tangila Bienz. 5. 41). Dina ditambe mena onso buimpe didi dia
Yesu ; diakadi dibakumbanyina bu lumu lua kutuadilabo bakuabu ne bu mukanda kudibu wa bumanyishi mu luendu luabu lua mudimu (Bienzedi 8. 35).
Mupostolo udi wamba ne : « kuidikishi bualu bubi, kadi bualu buimpe » (mv. 11 ; 1 Tesal. 5. 15). Bileshelu bia buimpe anyi bia bubi, tudi tubisangana mu mukanda eu. Tudi tuidikisha bileshelu kayi ? Diambedi tulonde Mukelenge Yesu, munda muende muakadi anu bualu buimpe (Mako 7. 37).

PAVUA muntu mukaji kampanda usua kuangata dipangadika kasanga, wakambila mulunda wende ne: “Kungeleshishi meji to, ngambila anu tshia kuenza. Nebikale bipepele.” Muntu mukaji eu uvua musue bua bamuambile tshia kuenza pamutu pa
... 
 ivua Nzambi muele. Bakamba ne: ‘Netuenze mêyi onso akutuambila Yehowa.’ (Ekesode 19:8) Bia dibungama, bakalua kusungula bua kubenga kutumikila tshivuabu balaye Yehowa. Tshilejilu tshiabu etshi tshidi mua kutupesha dilongesha dia mushinga edi: tuangatayi misangu yonso budikadidi buetu bua kudisuguila malu ne mushinga wa bungi, ne tutungunukayi ne kulamata Yehowa bikole ne kutumikila mikenji yende.—1 Kolinto 10:11.

18 Yehowa mmutupeshe dipa dia budikadidi bua kudisunguila malu, didi ditupetesha budikadidi bulelela. (2 Kolinto 3:17) Tudi tuangata dipa edi ne mushinga wa bungi bualu didi dituambuluisha bua kuangata mapangadika adi aleja mutudi banange Yehowa bikole. Nunku, tutungunukayi ne kuangata mapangadika adi amutumbisha ne tunemekayi bukenji budi nabu bakuabu bua kuenza mudimu ne dipa dia mushinga mukole edi.

Bualu buadikema buenzeka !!!! Mu Tshikondo kapanda, Mills Tshibangu, mumanyishi wa malu a dikebulula, uvua mulongolole muyuki mushime ne bamanyishi ba Malu a ngumu mimpe ku nzubu yende mu Kinshasa.
Mills Tshibangu udi mupatula bipeta bia makebulula avuaye muenze mu tshilumbu tshia mine ya lithium ya Manono mu provense wa Tanganyika.
Udi wamba ne: dolare miliyo 20 ivuabu bateke mu konte kampanda bua bilumbu bivua pankatshi pa banayi (DATOMIE ne ABZ) ivua mijimine mu banke.
Ndi ne bijadiki ne mêna a bantu bonso bavua bapete ndambu wa makuta avuabu banyenge , ke tshiakambilaye bena tshiamu tshia ngumu.
Bua bantu bonso badibu bapeshe makuta aa, mbimpe nuenu bonso nuye ku kabadi bua kudilengeja kumpala kua meme kutela mêna enu. »
Muntu uvua ulombola tshibilu etshi wakamba ne: makuta avuabu banyenge aa bavua baapingaja bua kufuta bamfumu ba mbulamatadi bintu biabu, bu mudi ba-ministre, ba- conseillers ne ba-inspecteur général bavua balombola midimu ya mbulamatadi.
Tudi ne bua kujadika ne Mills Tshibangu wakakuatshibua kunyima kua pakapatukaye ku tshiibi tshivuaye ulombola ne bilondeshele balunda bende Badi bajadika ne Mills tshibangu udi mukuatshibue Kudi pambulushi ne kumutumabu ku biro bia bampulushi bia Mbata , mu tshimenga tshia Bandalungwa, nansha muvuabu kabayi banji kumanya malu adibu bamubanda nawu.

TSHIBUMBA TSHIA NSENTEDI Ngondo wa 12 2014 | Udi mua kusemena pabuipi ne Nzambi
Nzambi udiku ukumona kule nende anyi peshi mulunda wende? Ukadiku mudiebeje bua kumanya ni kudi mushindu wa wewe kudia bulunda ne Nzambi anyi?
Bena Lomo ba kale bavua benze mushindu muimpe wa kukeba ditalala ne bisa bivua kabiyi ne muaba wa kusomba musunguluke bia ku Nord kua Afrike.
Bualu bua mu nsombelu wa Davidi, mukalenge wa Isalele budi mua kukuambuluisha bua kukanda tshiji tshiebe padibu bakuenzele bualu bubi anyi bakubunde.

Bible udi utuleja patoke tshikala Yehowa ne Muanende Yezu Kristo mua kuenza bua makenga adi Satana Diabolo mukebeshe. Bible udi wamba ne: “Ke bualu kayi Muana wa Nzambi wakamueneshibua: bua kubutula midimu ya Diabolo.” (1 Yone 3:8) Ndongoluelu wa malu wa lukuka, lukinu ne malu mabi eu neabutuke. Kadi bua Satana Diabolo “mukokeshi wa buloba ebu,” Yezu mmulaye ne: ‘neamuipate.’ (Yone 12:31) Pikala Satana katshiyi ukokesha, nebajadike buloba bupibupia bua buakane ne buloba ebu nebulue muaba wa dita
... 
a malu mabi mu bulongolodi bupiabupia ebu? Kakumbusha dipa didi nadi bantu dia kudisunguila malu anyi kubavuija biamu bua yeye kuenza bualu ebu to. Kadi, nealongeshe bantu badi batumikila njila yende, ubambuluisha bua kulekela meji ne bienzedi bibi.
Nzambi neumbushe malu onso adi akebesha makenga
Ntshinyi tshienza Nzambi bua njiwu mibi idi ukuata bantu mu tshimpitshimpi? Mmulaye ne: Bukalenge buende nebutuadije kukokesha buloba bujima mu katupa kîpi emu. Muntu udi Nzambi muteke mukalenge wa Buka
...
shuwa, Yezu udi ne bukole bua kubisha bantu badi bafue ne kubapingaja ku muoyo.
Bikala lungenyi lua ne: bantu nebikale ne muoyo mu buloba muikala malu mabi kaayi mua kufikila bantu bimpe lukusankisha, kuenaku mua ku difundila tshipatshila tshia kulonga Bible bua kumanya Nzambi mulelela ne tshidiye mulongolole anyi? Bantemu ba Yehowa ba muaba uudi nebikale ne disanka bua kukuambuluisha bua kupeta dimanya dia malu aa. Tudi tukulomba bua umonangane nabu anyi ufundile bapatudi ba tshibejibeji etshi.

Mmunyi mudi bana mua kulonga mua kumanya Nzambi?
Bana bebe badi mua kulonga mua kunanga Nzambi anu bobu bajingulule ne: Nzambi udiku ne mmubanange. Bua bobu kunanga Nzambi bidi bikengela bamumanye. (1 Yone 4:8) Tshilejilu, bidi bikengela bamanye ne: Pavua Nzambi mufuke muntu uvua ne tshipatshila kayi? Bua tshinyi Nzambi mmulekele makenga? Ntshinyi tshikala Nzambi mua kuenzela bantu mu matuku atshilualua?—Bala Filipoyi 1:9.
Enza mudimu ne bifukibua bua kuambuluisha muanebe bua kumanya Nzambi ne kumunanga
Bua kuambuluisha bana bebe bua kunangabu Nzambi, udi ne bua kubaleja muudi wewe muine mumunange. Padibu bamona muudi mumunange, nebalonde tshilejilu tshiebe.—Bala Dutelonome 6:5-7; Nsumuinu 22:6.
Mmunyi muudi mua kulenga mioyo ya bana bebe?
Dîyi dia Nzambi didi ne bukole. (Ebelu 4:12) Nunku ambuluisha bana bebe bua kulongabu malongesha a nshindamenu a mu Dîyi dia Nzambi. Bua kulenga mioyo ya bantu, Yezu uvua wela bantu nkonko, ubateleja ne umvuija mvese. Bua wewe pebe kulenga mioyo ya bana bebe, udi mua kuidikija ndongeshilu wa Yezu.—Bala Luka 24:15-19, 27, 32.
Bualu bukuabu, miyuki ya mu Bible idi ileja muvua Nzambi wenzela bantu malu idi mua kuambuluisha bana bua kumanya Nzambi ne kumunanga. Mikanda idibu bapatule bua tshipatshila etshi idi ku Enternete mu adrese euwww.jw.org.—Bala 2 Timote 3:16.

‘Dinanga didi ditema bu ndimi ya kapia, bu kapia ka Yehowa mene.’—MUS. WA SOL. 8:6.
1, 2. Mukanda wa Musambu wa Solomo udi mua kuambuluisha banganyi? Bua tshinyi? (Tangila tshimfuanyi.)
‘MONA mudibu batapangana dîsu ne disanka ne bakuatangane ku tshianza bimpe. Nnganyi udi mua kuamba ne: ki mbanangangane ne muoyo mujima?’ Eyi nngenyi idi iluila mukulu udi ufuma ku dienza muyuki wa dibaka mu lungenyi. Padi bena dibaka bapiabapia aba babuela mu tshialu benda batua dikasa dia maja muaba udibu benze
... 
i kakuyi dinanga to. Dinanga ke tshimanyinu tshinene tshia dibaka dia bena Kristo. Ndinanga dia mushindu kayi adi? Ndinanga didi dimanyine pa mêyi manene a mu Bible anyi? (1 Yone 4:8) Ndinanga dia ku tshilelelu ditu bena mu dîku dimue balejangana anyi? Ndinanga ne dilamatangana ditu pankatshi pa balunda balelela anyi? (Yone 11:3) Ndinanga ditu pankatshi pa mulume ne mukajende anyi? (Nsu. 5:15-20) Bushuwa dinanga dilelela didi dishala kashidi didi pankatshi pa mulume ne mukajende didi dikongoloja
...
mbimpe bua bena mu dibaka badienzeje bua kulama kapia ka dinanga diabu kalakuka ne bua kuikala ne nsombelu udi wenza bua dinanga kukoladi.—Mâko 10:6-9.
18 Paudi ukeba muntu wa kubuela nende mu dibaka, udi musue kupeta muntu uudi mua kunanga ne muoyo mujima ne kuenza bua dinanga adi dikole ne kadijimi, anu mudibi bileja mu Musambu wa Solomo. Nansha biwikala ukeba muntu wa kubuela nende mu dibaka peshi ukadimu, udi mua kupeta dinanga dilelela, mbuena kuamba ne: ‘kapia ka Yehowa.’—Mus. wa Sol. 8:6.

Mbimweneke anu patooke ne, dibatiiza didi ne mushinga munene, kadi mushindu utudi babatiijiibwe udi ne bwalu anyi? Kudi dibatiiza dijaalame, anyi cyônsò ciikalaku aci neciikale anu mwa kukumbana anyi? Pa nanku pawikala witabuuja Bible, EYOWA, kudi dibatiiza dijaalame.
Ekeleeziya yàbûngì idi ibatiiza mu Dînà dya Taatu, Mwânà, ne Nyuma Mwîmpè, kadi edi kî ndidi dijaalame bilondeshile Bible to.
Mu Byenzedi 19, kuvwa bamwe bantu bakaavwa biitabuuje mu Yesu Kilisto, kadi kabayi banji kupeta Nyuma Mwî
... 
matunga ônsò, nubabatiize mu dînà dya Taatu, ne dya Mwânà, ne dya Nyuma Mwîmpè:
[Dînà dya Taatu nganyi? Dînà dya Mwânà? Dînà dya Nyuma Mwîmpè?]
Maako 16.16
Ewu udi witabuuja ne ubatiijiibwa neasungidiibwe; kadi ewu udi kayi witabuuja neapiishiibwe.
Yone 5.43
Ndi mulwe mu dînà dya Taatu wanyi, kadi nwênù kanwena nungakidila to: kadi paalwa mukwabo mu dînà dyende yêyè mwine, awu kaayi nenumwakidile.
[PadiYe ulwa mu Dînà dya Taatu Wende, mpindyewu Dînà Dyende nganyi?]
Yone 10.30
Mêmè ne Taatu wanyi
...
à dya Mukalenge Yesu.
Nenku paakamana Pôlò kubatentekela byanza, Nyuma Mwîmpè wakabatuulukila; ne baakaakula mu myakulu, ne baakamba biprofeta.
Efeso 4.5
Mukalenge umwepele, diitabuuja dimwepele, dibatiiza dimwepele.
Kolosaayi 3.17
Nenku cyônsò cinudi nwenza mu dîyì anyi mu cyenzedi, enzaayi byônsò mu dînà dya Mukalenge Yesu, biikale nusakidila Nzambi ne Taatu kupicila ku yêyè.
I Yone 5.7
Bwalu kudi basatu badi bafila bujaadiki mu dyulu, Taatu, Dîyì, ne Nyuma Mwîmpè: ne basatu aba badi umwepele.

DIPA ditambe buimpe didi ne bua kutuenzeja bua kuleja dianyisha. Yezu wakaleja dilongesha edi yeye mumane kuondopa bantu balume dikumi bavua ne disama dibi divua dienda ditekesha mubidi divua kadiyi ne buanga tshikondo atshi. Umue wa ku bantu balume dikumi “wakapingana utumbisha Nzambi ne dîyi dikole.” Yezu wakamba 
... 
 bungi adi atangila muntu au ne kumanya bua tshinyi uvua mukusungile anyi? Yehowa Nzambi uvua mufile dipa dia tshia kupikula natshi bantu bua kubasungila, mmusue bua umanye bimpe tshidiye ne udie nende malanda makole. Bible udi wamba ne: “Semenayi pabuipi ne Nzambi ne yeye neasemene pabuipi nenu.”—Yakobo 4:8.
Leja ditabuja mu tshia kupikula natshi bantu. “Muntu udi uleja ditabuja kudi Muana udi ne muoyo wa tshiendelele.” (Yone 3:36) Kuleja ditabuja kudi kumvuija tshinyi? Kuleja ditabuja mu tshia
...
 ba Yehowa nebenze tshibilu tshia kuvuluka lufu lua Yezu mu Dibidi dia 11/4/2017, dîba dimane kubuela. Tshibilu etshi netshienzeke mu dîba dimue, nebenzamu muyuki udi umvuija mushinga udi nawu lufu lua Yezu ne muatuadilalu bantu masanka mpindieu ne mu matuku kumpala. Tshidimu tshishale etshi bantu batue ku miliyo 20 ba pa buloba bujima bavua babuele mu Tshivulukilu. Tudi tukubikila ne muoyo mujima bua ulue kuenza netu tshibilu etshi bua tuleje Nzambi dianyisha bua dipa diende ditambe bunene edi.

MÊYI adi kuulu aa ngavua Davidi mutumbishe nawu mamu kampanda uvuaye musambakene nende. Dîna diende divua Abigayila. Ntshinyi tshivua tshisake Davidi bua kumutumbisha? Mmunyi mudi tshilejilu tshia mamu eu mua kutuambuluisha?
Davidi wakasambakena ne mukaji wa nzubu eu pavuaye unyema mukalenga Shaula. Abigayila uvua mukaji wa Nabala, muntu mubanji uvua ne mikoko ya bungi mu tshitupa tshia buloba tshia mikuna tshia ku sud kua Yuda. Davidi ne bantu bende bavua “bu lumbu” kudi balami ba mikoko ba Nab
... 
 dilomba dia Davidi. Ke Davidi kulongolola bua kunyoka Nabala bua diandamuna diende divua dinyingalaja ne kadiyi dia meji. Nabala ne bena mu dîku diende bavua ne bua kuambula bujitu bua bupote buende.—1 Sam. 25:2-13, 21, 22.
Pakajingulula Abigayila bipeta bibi bia bualu buvuabu balongolola bua kuenza ne lukasa, wakenza bualu kampanda ne dikima. Wakasengelela Davidi ne kanemu muimanyine pa malanda ende ne Yehowa. Wakapesha Davidi uvua ne bua kulua mukalenge biakudia bia bungi buende yeye ne bantu
...
nzele nansha. Bualu bukuabu, patudi tumona bualu kampanda bubi bukeba kuenzeka, mbimpe tuenze tshionso tshitudi mua kuenza bua kubuepuka. Bushuwa, tudi mua kuamba anu bu mufundi wa Misambu mukuabu wakambila Nzambi ne: “Unyishe dijingulula dimpe dia malu ne meji.”—Mis. 119:66.
Bantu bakuabu badi mua kumona mutudi ne meji anyi ne lungenyi lujalame ku malu atudi tuenza. Nansha bobu bakule anyi kabayi bakule, badi mua kudiumvua anu bu Davidi wakamba ne: “Wewe usankishibue kabidi bua lungenyi luebe.”

Katanga wa ku mutu: Jacques Kyabula mu Zambie bua mushinga wa bukula udi mubanda
Mushinga wa bukula bua manvua mmubande bikole mu misoko ya mu Katanga wa ku mutu. Bua kujikija lutatu elu, ngovena wa provense wa Katanga wa ku mutu Jacques Kyabula katwe muya mu Lusaka mu tshimenga tshikulu tshia ditunga dia Zambie mu dia matuku dikumi ni isambobo ngondo muisatu.
“Ndi mu Lusaka bua kupeta diandamuna dia lukasa bua mushinga udi mubanda manvua. Mvua muyukile ne Chipoka Mulenga, ministre wa malu a bungenda wa mu République de Zambie. Tshimuma tshinene tshia ntete tshidi tshipetela bena mudimu betu ba malu a bungenda”.
Bu mudi dipatula dia bintu dia mu ditunga edi ne mushinga wa bungi bua kujadikulula Katanga wa ku mutu udi utekemena anu ditunga dia Zambie, Jacques Kyabula udi wamba ne: yeye ne mbulamatadi wende nebakoleshe dipatula dia bintu bua kubenga kueyemena matunga adi pabuipi nende. Wakasakidila ne:
” Tudi tuenza mudimu bikole bua kuvudija bia pa buloba bua kubenga kueyemena bena mutumba betu”.
Tudi mua kuamba ne: tshibuta tshia bukula tshia kilo 25, tshivuabu bapana ngondo umue mushale ku 25 000 wa muana muena kongo lelu tshidi bapana ku 55 000 , anyi too ne ku 60 000 (27 USD) mu Lubumbashi (Katanga). Badi bamba ne: muntu udi ne nzala kena ne ditshi to, bualu bua lukasa bua kujikija tshilumbu etshi ke tshidi bena lucho (katanga wa ku mutu) basue bikole mpindieu.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

PANKATSHI pa bidimu bia 1930, tatuanyi James Sinclair ne mamuanyi Jessie bakaya kusombela mu Bronx, tshitupa tshia mu tshimenga tshia New York. Umue wa ku bantu ba kumpala bakamanyanganabu nabu uvua Willie Sneddon uvua mufumine mu ditunga dia Écosse muvuabu bafumina pabu. Mu minite ya ntuadijilu ya dituilangana diabu, bakayukila malu avua atangila mêku abu. Biakenzeka bidimu ndambu kumpala kua kundelabu.
Mamuanyi wakambila Willie ne: matuku makese kumpala kua Mvita minene kuenzekayi, tutuende ne
... 
Suiter utangila. Bidimu bikese pashishe, bakambikila mu biro bia muanetu Nathan Knorr, uvua ulombola mudimu wetu wa pa buloba bujima tshikondo atshi. Wakangumvuija ne: umue wa ku bana betu uvua wenza mudimu mu biro biende uvua ne bua kuya kubuela mu Kalasa ka Mudimu wa Bukalenge bua ngondo mujima, pashishe bavua ne bua kumutuma mu Tshibambalu tshia mudimu. Bakampingaja pa muaba wende ne tuvua tuenza mudimu ne Don Adams. Don eu ke muanetu wa balume uvua muitabe dilomba dianyi dia kuenza mudimu ku
...
ka dia Yehowa mbukole buetu.’—Neh. 8:10.
Mudimu wa kuyisha malu malelela a Bukalenge utshidi utungunuka, ne muntu yonso mu bulongolodi bua Yehowa udi ne bua kuwenza. Mvua ne disanka ne diakalenga dia kuenza mudimu munkatshi mua bidimu bia bungi ne bana betu ba balume ne ba bakaji bashindame bavua ne lulamatu. Bela manyi ba bungi bamvua muenze nabu mudimu kabatshiena pa buloba apa to. Kadi ndi ne disanka bua mundi muenze mudimu pamue ne bantu ba mu nyuma aba bavua ne lulamatu mu mudimu wa Yehowa.

Philon wa mu Alexandrie, muena nkindi wa mu bidimu lukama bia kumpala udi wamba ne: “Malu a Nzambi kaatu umvuika to.”
Shaula wa ku Tâso wakambila bena nkindi ba mu Atena mu bidimu lukama bia kumpala ne: “Nzambi kena kule ne yonso wa kutudi to.”
PAUDI ubala biambilu bibidi ebi, ntshiepi tshidi tshipetangana ne mmuenenu webe? Bantu ba bungi batu bamona ne: mêyi a Shaula wa ku Tâso udibu babikila kabidi ne: mupostolo Paulo aa mmêyi adi akankamija. (Bienzedi 17:26, 27) Mu Bible mudi mêyi makuabu a m
... 
u kabena mua kumanya bule bua tshikondo tshia dikalaku dia Nzambi, bualabale bua lungenyi luende ne ndondo wa meji ende to
Mudibi mua kukuambuluisha: Wewe ubala Bible ne umulonga, kuakulekela kulonga malu mapiamapia adi atangila Nzambi ne njila yende to. Ebi bidi biumvuija ne: tudi mua kusemena pabuipi ne Tatu wetu wa mu diulu bua kashidi.
Malu audi mua kumanya
Bu mutudi katuyi mua kumvua bimpe imue ngikadilu ya Nzambi, kabiena bisua kumvuija ne: katuena mua kufika ku dimumanya to. Bible udi ne 
...
uluisha bua kumanya bumuntu bua Yehowa anu muudi musue, bua kukolesha bulunda buebe nende.
Bible kena wakula malu a Mufuki pa mutu pa mutu to, kadi udi ne malu a bungi adi mua kutuambuluisha bua kufika ku dimanya Nzambi. Udiku musue kulonga malu a bungi adi atangila Yehowa Nzambi anyi? Bantemu ba Yehowa badi balongesha bantu Bible tshianana ku mbanza yabu kabayi bafuta makuta. Tudi tukulomba bua kukeba Bantemu ba Yehowa ba muaba uudi musombele anyi buela mu site wetu wa www.jw.org, ku Enternete.

Udi wela meji ne: . . .
Ntshintu tshidi mu muoyo webe anyi?
Mmasanka a mu diulu anyi?
Mmbulamatadi wa mu diulu anyi?
TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA
‘Nzambi wa mu diulu neajadike bukalenge bukuabu budi kabuyi bubutudibua tshiendelele.’—Danyele 2:44, Mukanda wa Nzambi. ‘Bakutupa muana mulume; [mbulamatadi anyi] bukokeshi nebuikale pa diapa diende.’ —Yeshaya 9:6.
TSHIDI MVESE EYI YUMVUIJA
TUDI NE BUA KUITABA TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA ANYI?
Eyowa, bua malu bu mudi aa:
1. Yezu wakaleja malu ikala Bukalenge bua Nzambi mua kuenza. Yezu wakambila bayidi bende bua kulomba bua Bukalenge bua Nzambi bulue ne bua disua dia Nzambi dienzeke pa buloba. (Matayi 6:9, 10) Yezu wakenza malu avua aleja muikala Nzambi mua kuandamuna disambila edi.
Tshilejilu, Yezu wakadisha bantu bavua ne nzala, wakondapa babedi, kubisha ne bantu ku lufu. (Matayi 15:29-38; Yone 11:38-44) Yezu ke Mfumu wa mu Bukalenge bua Nzambi. Nanku wakaleja kakese tshianana malu ikala Bukalenge ebu mua kuenzela bantu.—Buakabuluibua 11:15.
2. Malu adi enzeka lelu adi aleja ne: Bukalenge bua Nzambi bukadi pa kulua. Yezu uvua muambe ne: kumpala kua Bukalenge ebu kuteka ditalala pa buloba, kuvua malu avua ne bua kuvulangana pa buloba, bu mudi: mvita, biyole bia nzala ne bikumina.—Matayi 24:3, 7.
NKi mmalu atudi tumona lelu anyi? Nunku, tuikalayi batuishibue ne: Bukalenge bua Nzambi bukadi pa kujikija ntatu yonso eyi.
