28 Uinashku-pishimu 2017
Uinashku-pishimu utat 22 e tshishtuakanit, tshika shenakanu tshishtukan tshetshi patshitinakanit aimun anite Ekuanitshiu, Tshiuetinit, tshetshi ut uauitakaniht Apuiat ka ui tshimanakaniht.
-
Innu Web tapan ka patshitinakanit aimun anite Mani-utenam 10 takuatshi-pishimu utat. Anite kanut ka pimipaniakanit, Rafaël Bourrellis, utshimau ne atusseun e uitakanit mak ka katshitinakanit anite Boralex, eiapishish uauitamupan tshe ishinakuannit nenu atusseunnu Apuiat.
-
Innuat mak nenua uatshi-atusemaht Boralex mak Eshi-pimipanit kashutshishimakak eka nita ka ishkuapanit ute Kanata (RES) shash tshitshipanipanat 1 e tshishtuakanniti takuatshi-pishimua, e patshitinahk aimunnu anite mamu ka tanannut tshetshi ut uapatiniaht innua eshinakuanit nenu atusseunnu Apuiat.
-
8 Ushkau-pishimu 2016 nuash 19:00
Takuakut 8 ushkau-pishimu, Innuat uitamupanat niaushunaht Boralex tshe uitshi-atussemaht tshetshi ut tutaminiti nenu atusseunnu Apuiat, assi apuiat tshe taht 200 MW anite nenua assia mamu ka tananut utenau Port-Cartier.

MUKENJI MUIMPE WA LUMU LUIMPE LUA LUPANDU LUDI LUAMBIBUA KUDI BUONSO.
Tshikoso
Kudi malu manene asatu adi alenga bukua bantu:
- Mibi (= malu mabi)
- Bupika bua bubi (muji kampanda wa bubi ne malu mabi onso)
- Ntatu ne makenga a mubidi.
Bualu bua kumpala budi bujika ku lufu lua Kilisto bua bualu buetu (Lom. Shap. 3-5).
Buibidi budi bujika ku lufu luetu ne Kilisto (Lom. 6).
Buandekelu buisatu nebukumbane palua Kilisto bua kutungata (Lom. 8).
Kadi mu malu onso, tudi ne bua kutekemena kudi Kilisto.

Panyima pa bamane kufila bintu bia bungi mu tulasa tua mbulamatadi ne mu iniversite ya mu Kinshasa, bena mudimu ba ditunga bakatuadija kutangila malu a mbulamatadi.
Mu dilomba dia Mfumu wa ditunga, Général-Major Jean Pierre Kasongo Kabwik, mulombodi wa basalayi ba ditunga, wakapesha ba-maire ba bimenga 15 bia mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa, nkuasa, mêsa ne bibambalu bienza kudi ba-kuluna ba kale badi balue kuibaka ditunga.
Tshibilu etshi tshiakenzeka mu nzubu wa mbulamatadi wa ditunga mu dienza dia tshisangilu etshi, muvua kabidi tshindondi tshia mfumu wa mbulamatadi, ministre wa malu a munda mua ditunga, Jacquemin Shabani, ne mulombodi wa tshimenga tshia Kinshasa, Daniel Bumba.

- Mbanza -Ngungu: Mfumu wa ditunga mufika lelu ku Mbanza-Ngungu mu province wa Kongo central. Muaba uvua njiu wa mashinyi avua makuata kapia ne kushipa bantu ba bungi .
- Kananga: Ku Sankuru, nzubu mipte pa 200 wa mu umue musoku wa mu territoire wa Lodja mmiosha kudi ba nsonga ba musoku wa pabuipi naawu.
- Beni: Ku Nord Kivu , bena kasumbu kadi kaluisha disama dia ebola CAR kadi badiwula dibunda dia nsatala ya bukola bua mubidi ne badi benza mudimu ewu lumingu lushala ku Lwemba mu chefferie Babila-Babombi mu territoire wa Mambasa mu province wa Ituri.
- Goma:Ku Nord-Kivu, mu tshimenga tshia Goma mbuznulula lelu tshibilu tshinena tshidi tshikungija ba ministre ba malu a bukola bua mubidi ba matunga 9 adi mukalu ne ditunga dia congo bua kumuna mushindu wa kuluisha disama dia ebola ku mikalu ya matunga aa.
- Bukavu: Ku Bukavu , balongeshi mbimanyika kabidi mudimu wa dilongesha .
- Kinshasa: Luendu lua Bena Comité laïc de coordination CLC luvua luenzenka lelu mu tshimenga tshia kinshasa mu ditalala .

MUKEBULUDI kampanda wa muoyo mukole wa mu ditunga dia Écosse diende James Bruce wakakema bua tshivuaye mumone. Pavuaye mufike mu bikulu bia tshipela tshia mu Algérie wakamonamu bimanu bivua bileja ditshimuna dia bena Lomo! Pavua James Bruce mujandule bualu ebu mu tshidimu tshia 1765, kavua mumanye ne: uvua muimane muaba uvua tshimenga tshinene tshia kale tshia Thamugadi tshidibu babikila lelu ne: Timgad tshivua bena Lomo bibake mu Afrike wa ku Nord.
Mu 1881, bidimu bipite pa lukama bimane kupita
... 
ana bantu bapite pa 3 500, uvua ukumbana bantu ba bungi ba mu tshimenga tshia Timgad ne ba mu bimenga bia kumpenga. Pa tshinayilu, banayi bavua basaka bantu bua banange manaya a bena Lomo avua misangu ya bungi ne malu a buendenda ne a tshikisu.
Ntendelelu wa bena Lomo uvua pende ne buenzeji. Panshi pa muaba au ne bimanu bia bina bia mâyi bivua bilengeja ne bintu bia bungi bivua bileja malu a mu mianu ya bampangano. Bu muvua kunaya mu mâyi kuikala bualu buimpe mu nsombelu wa dituku dionso, bantu 
...
toke padiye wamba ne: “Malu a pa buloba ebu adi enda ashintulukangana.” Ke bualu kayi udi utulomba bua ‘kubenga kudinamu ne kasuki.’—1 Kolinto 7:31.
Dibutuka dia tshimenga tshia Timgad didi dijadika ne: disanka dilelela ne nsombelu muimpe kabiena bishindamene mu mêyi avuabu bafunde avuabu bapete mu lusenga lua ku Nord kua Afrike. Kadi ndishindamene pa tshidi Bible utuvuluija etshi: “buloba budi bupita ne majinga abu kabidi, kadi muntu udi wenza disua dia Nzambi, udi ushala kashidi.”—1 Yone 2:17.

MATAYI 9:27-34; 13:54-58 MÂKO 6:1-6
YEZU UDI WONDOPA MPOFU NE KAMAMA
BANTU BA MU NAZALETA BADI BAMUBENGA
Yezu mmuenze malu a bungi mu dituku edi. Panyima pa dipingana diende ufuma mu buloba bua Dekapoli, wakondopa mukaji uvua ne disama dia mashi apueka ne kubisha muana wa bakaji wa Yailo ku lufu. Kadi dituku ki ndianji kujika to. Pavua Yezu mumbuke kua Yailo, bampofu babidi badi bamulonda benda bela mbila ne: “Muana wa Davidi, tumvuilaku luse.”—Matayi 9:27.
Pavua bantu abu babikile Yezu ne: “Mua
... 
kula diakamue. Misumba ya bantu yakakatshila bua bualu ebu, yamba ne: “Katutu banji kumona bualu bua mushindu eu mu Isalele to.” Bafalese bavua pabu muaba eu. Kabena mua kuelesha bishima ebi mpata to, nunku badi bambulula kabidi bualu buvuabu babande nabu Yezu bua kuvuaye upetela bukole bua kuenza nabu mudimu, bamba ne: “Muntu eu udi wipata bademon ne bukole bua mfumu wa bademon.”—Matayi 9:33, 34.
Matuku makese pashishe, Yezu wakapingana mu tshimenga tshiabu tshia Nazaleta, mpindieu wakaya ne ba
...
ne bijadiki bionso, too ne meji a bungi adi Yezu nawu ne midimu ya bukole ivuaye wenza, badi bamubenga. Bu muvuabu bibidilangane ne nende, too ne balela bende badi balenduka bua bualu buende, bimusaka bua kuamba ne: “Muprofete katu utumbila mu buloba buabu ne mu nzubu muende to.”—Matayi 13:57.
Bushuwa, Yezu udi ukema bua dipangila diabu dia ditabuja. Nunku kena wenza tshishima nansha tshimue muaba eu to, “pa kumbusha bantu bakese bavua basama bavuaye mutentekele bianza, mubuondope.”—Mâko 6:5, 6.

RDC: Patrick Muyaya udi usakidila bua mudimu udi ne bua kuenzeka bua kumanya tshidi tshifumina ku dikenga dia mu RDC.
Patrick Muyaya, ministre wa Malu a kumanyishangana ne a bikandakanda, wakenza muyuki ne mulombodi wa Malu a matunga makuabu Christophe Lutundula, ku televizion wa ditunga dia congo mudimue dia matuku dikumi ni isatu ngondo muisatu, bua kuakula mushindu udi malu enda kumpala mu ditunga dia congo. Muyaya wakaleja mushinga wa kujadika ne: malu malelela adi mu mukanda munene wa malu a kale bua kujadika malu onso avua menzeke bua kumanya ntuadijilu wa lutatu mu ditunga dia congo.
“Tudi tupeta tshitupa tshietu, etshi ke bumpianyi buetu. Bualu ebu kabuena bupatula bujitu bua bena matunga a pa buloba bujima nansha kakese, bualu difika dia bena tshimuangi ba mu Rwanda ke didi dipeteshe ditunga dia Congo ntatu”.
Bua mbulamatadi wa ditunga dia Congo, tshilumbu tshia bukubi tshia ku est kua ditunga dia RDC katshiena ne mushinga lelu bu kumpala to.
“Lelu bena Kongo badi ne bua kuikala bashindike ne: katshia tshilumbu tshia bukubi didi ku bukokeshi bua Tshisekedi, tudi bumvue ne tuetu ke ba kumpala bua kujikija ntatu yetu”, ke muvuaye mujadike.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

1 YEHOWA
Dîna dia Nzambi n’Yehowa ne didi diumvuija ne: “Yeye udi uvuija.” Yehowa nNzambi wa bukole buonso, ne wakafuka bintu bionso. Udi ne bukole bua kuenza tshionso tshidiye upangadija bua kuenza.
Mu tshiena Ebelu, bavua bafunda dîna dia Nzambi ne maleta anayi. Mu Tshiluba, maleta au mmakudimuna ne: YHWH. Dîna dia Nzambi didi mu mifundu ya ntuadijilu ya Bible ya mu tshiena Ebelu misangu mitue ku 7000. Bantu ba pa buloba bujima badi batela dîna Yehowa mu mishindu mishilashilangane, badishindum
... 
ha] wende bua mikoko.”—Yone 10:11.
Bualu bukuabu, padi muntu wenza bualu ne ‘anyima wende yonso,’ bidi biumvuija ne: udi ubuenza ne muoyo mujima ne ubuenza ne muende muonso. (Matayi 22:37; Dutelonome 6:5) Badi kabidi mua kutela muaku “anyima” bua kuleja dijinga didi nadi tshifukibua tshidi ne muoyo. Badi mua kubikila muntu mufue anyi tshitalu ne: anyima mufue.—Nomba 6:6; Nsumuinu 23:2; Yeshaya 56:11; Hagai 2:13.
18 NYUMA
Muaku wa tshiena Ebelu ne wa tshiena Greke idibu bakudimune ne: “nyuma” mu 
...
 nkubambuluisha bua kujingululabu bua tshinyi badi ne bua kuikala batumikila. Kudi kabidi kumvuija kubalongesha bua kunanga Yehowa ne Bible, Dîyi diende, ne kujingulula mêyi manene adimu.
31 BADEMON
Bademon nnyuma mibi itu kayiyi imueneka idi ne bukole bupite bua bantu. Bademon mbanjelu babi. Bakanyanguka pavuabu badivuije bena lukuna ba Nzambi pakamutombokelabu. (Genese 6:2; Yuda 6) Bakadisanga ne Satana mu ditombokela diende dia Yehowa.—Dutelonome 32:17; Luka 8:30; Bienzedi 16:16; Yakobo 2:19.

Yobo wakhalele nu gutshigina egi Nzambi udi nu ngolo jia gumufuzumuna
14:7-9, 13-15
Ha gumonesa luholo akhadile gusha mutshima egi Nzambi mbawumufuzumuna, Yobo wahanele gifezegeselo gia mutshi
—yajiya gukhala mutshi wa mabundu a olive Gila akoka mutshi wa olive, wajiya gusaphutshila luko, handaga miji yenji yana gudijiga muavula mu mavu. Gula miji yene khenji ifukha ndo mu mavu, mutshi wene mbawukula luko
Gula mvula ya nogela gibunji gia mutshi wa olive, wajiya gusaphutshila luko, miji yenji yajiya guvutugila luko lujingu ha gula jithango jizoge luko “gifua hawakhalele mu ulenge.”

Bilondolola Bible
Masobo a Pasaka keadipo mu Bible. Inoko shi ukimbe kuyuka kwine koatambile, ukayuka mwine mushintulwila Pasaka—kishi kimanine pa bisela bya kala bya leza wa bumeni. Tulangulukilei bidi pa bino bintu.
Dijina: Dibuku dimo (The Encyclopædia Britannica) dinena’mba: “Kishima kya Angele kyalamwinwe bu Pasaka kekiyukenepo kokitambile; dibuku (the Anglo-Saxon priest Venerable Bede) dya mu myaka katwa ka mwānda dinena’mba dino dijina i ditambe kudi Eostre, leza mukaji wa muketeko wa mu 
... 
lklore, Mythology and Legend) dinena’mba, buluwe bwa kukimba mai a Pasaka, obādi bamona bu ādi elwa na kalulu ka Pasaka, “ke makayopo a bana, ino kyadi kisela kitumbe kya leza wa bumeni.” Mu bibidiji bimo bantu bādi bakulupile amba mai mapente a Pasaka “ādi abwanya kuleta mu muswelo wa maleñanya nsangaji, bupeta, bukomo bwa ngitu, ne bulami.”—Traditional Festivals.
Bisandi bipya: “Bantu bādi bamona bu kwimuna Eastre, leza mukaji wa Muketeko wa mu Scandinavie abe papo kuvwala bisandi bipya mpika,
...
Days) dilombola biyampe kwine kutambile Pasaka amba: “Ne kutatana kwine mpika, kipwilo pokyādi kikishimikwashimikwa kyāitabije bibidiji bya bajentaila ne kwibipa nshintulwilo ya bwine kidishitu.”
Bible upeleja kutōta Leza na kulonda bishi nansha bisela bimufītyija mutyima. (Mako 7:6-8) Kisonekwa kya 2 Bene Kodinda 6:7 kinena’mba: “‘Tambai mu bukata mwabo, ne kwisansanya,’ i Yehova unena, ‘kadi lekai kutenga kintu kya disubi.’” Pasaka i fetyi ya bajetaila, ipelwanga na boba basaka kusangaja Leza.

Yoshua nu Solomo atshiginyishile diago egi laji diagasue dia Yehowa diana gutagana. (Yosh 23:14; 1Maf 8:56) Mbimbi jiazuelele akombeledi awa mbadi a giamatshidia jidi gutukuatesa ha gukolesa gutshigina guetu.—2Kol 13:1; Tito 1:2.
Luholo lutshi Yehowa watagenesele malaji enji mu tangua dia Yoshua? Hangoshi nu fami yaye, talenu video idi nu muto wa lumene egi ‘Pas une seule parole n’a failli.’ Gungima, kambenu mvutu jia mihu eyi: (1) Luholo lutshi wajiya gulandula ndaga jiakalegele Lahaba jiamonesele gutshigina guenji? (Heb 11:31; Yak 2:24-26) (2) Luholo lutshi gifezegeselo gia Akana gidi mumonesa egi gushiya mikhuala ya Nzambi nu mutshima wagasue guana gubata malamba akola? (3) Enya gu dimbo dia Gibeona akhalele alui a yita, uvi mukunda natshi adimbile Yoshua nu akambele guhuima nu enya Isalele? (4) Luholo lutshi mbimbi jia Yehowa jiatagenesewe tangua mafumu atano a enya Amole akambele guluisa enya Isalele? (Yos 10:5-14) (5) Luholo lutshi Yehowa wagukuatesele tangua washile ndaga jia mu nyuma ha fundo dia thomo mu lujingu luaye?—Mat 6:33.
Gula tuatangiza ndaga jiagasue jiatukalegele gale Yehowa, eji adi gutukalegela nu jinyi mbawutukalegela, gutshigina guetu mu malaji enji mbagukola diago.—Lomo 8:31, 32.

Yezu Kristo anyi?
Lukonko: Yezu Kristo anyi?
Diandamuna: Mumushindu mukuabu wa tshikonkelu “Nzambi udi wikalanganaku anyi?” Kudi bantu ndambu badi ba dikonka ne Yezu Kristo udi wikalanganaku, ne babungi badi bitabuja ne Yezu Kristo uvua muntu, uvua ba buloba, kukadi bidimu 2000. Makokanganyi adi alua diba didi bajinga kufila buikadi ba yezu kristo bujima. Mangomba ne bisumbu bionso bidi bilongesha ne Yesu kristo muprofete eshi mulongeshi eshi muntu mulelela.
C.S. Lewis mu mukanda wenda “Mere Chr
... 
ne kumpala kua abalahama kuikalaku, meme mvuaku!”’
Nanku, bakangula mabue bua kumuasa, kadi Yezu wakasokoma, kupatukaye mu ntempelo (Yone 8:59). Yezu uleja buikadi buende bu “udiku” tshiezedi tshiabushuwa tshia dina diendadia Nzambi wa mu diwungila dikulu kulu (Ekesode 3:14). Bua tshinyi bayuda buavua bambula kabidi mabua bua kuasa Yezu. Wikala kayi muamba uvua Nzambi to? Kupenda kua Nzambi bua bena yuda kudiamba ne udi bu Nzambi?
Yone 1:1 “Diyi diakadi Nzambi.” Yone 1:14 wamba ne, “Diyi tshiaka
...
(Yone 2:2). Anu Yezu nkayende ki uvua bua kufuta mayioka a mushindu eu ( Lomo 5:8; 2 Kolinto 5:21). Yezu uvua anu tshikikala Nzambi bua kufutayi mabanza. Ki kabingila kavua kenzeja buani ashala muntu, buvua ni afua,mmuoyo udi koku anu kupitshila ku ditabuja mu Yezu Kristo. Bu Nzambi bua Yezu budi anu njila lua lupandu, bu Nzambi bua Yezu ki kabingila kavuayi muamba ne, “ndi njila ne bulelela ne muoyi.muntu kena mua kulua kudi. Tatu kayi mupitshile kundi to” (Yone 14:6).
English
Yezu Kristo anyi?

Monaayi, nênnùtùmìnè Eliya muprofeta kumpala kwa dilwa dya dituku dinene dya mukalenge didi dikwacisha bwôwà:
Nenku yêyè neakudimune myoyi ya baataatu bwa kuyitangija kudi bânà, ne myoyi ya bânà bwa kuyitangija kudi baataatu baabo, bwa ncilu kubutula buloba ku mulawu nansha.

Kasaka ka Bakunkushi-Bakulu akatumikilaa ku biro bikata bya Batemwe ba Yehowa bi ku New York, mu États-Unis, kwakwa nyi kwa kakwete kukunkusha ma Betele e mu nsenga ishima. Muntu ooso ku Betele e na mbalo yatumikaa, byayikala mu biro, mu kikuku sunga mu nshibo yakudiila. Ekeleziya wa Nzambi
Mianda ya mu Mukanda
JS Robertson
Table des matières abrégée:
Table des matières détaillée:
Diyi edi “ekeleziya” didi difuma mu muaku wa Bena Gelika wa kale, “ekkēlesia”, kuandamuna kua muaku ne, “Tshisumbu tshia bantu babikidibua munkatshi mua bisamba”. Ekeleziya wa Nzambi udi tshisumbu tshia bantu babikidibua munkatshi mua bisamba bia ba pa buloba bua kuikalabo bantu bua bualu buende. Mvese mukuabo wa mu Mukanda wa Nzambi udi utukuatshisha bimpe bua kujingulula bualu. Bapos
... 
abidi adi Nzambi musue. Bualu bua kumpala budi ne, Udi musue bantu bende bamutumbishe. Tuakumana kumona ne, Tatu udi musue batendeledi bamutendelele mu nyuma ne mu bulelela. Bualu buibidi budi ne, Bobo bikale bamanyishi ba buimpe buende ne dinanga diende kumpala kua bantu. Petelo udi wamba ne, “Nulue kudiye (kudi Yesu) ndibue didi ne muoyo, diakapidiabo kudi bantu, kadi didi disungula kudi Nzambi, ndia mushinga mukole; nunku nuenu kabidi, ba mabue adi ne muoyo, nuakashibua nzubu wa Nyuma, bua ku
...
me ndi A ne Z, wa kumudilu ne wa kunshikidilu, tshibangidilu ne kunshikidilu. Meme Yesu nakutuma muanjelo wanyi bua kunumanyisha malu aa bua bualu bua ekeleziya. Ndi muji ne kankanunuina bia Davidi, mutoto udi ukenka, wa nkesha. Nyuma ne mukaji musela badi bamba ne, Lua. Udi umvua, ambe biende ne, Lua. Ne udi ne nyota, alue biende; udi musue, angate mayi a muoyo tshianana. Yeye udi umanyisha malu aa udi wamba ne, E, ndi ndua lubilu. Amen; lua, Mukelenge Yesu” (Buakabuluibua 22:12,13, 16,17, 20).

Tudi mua kuyila malesona a bungi ku malu adi mafunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi bualu bua Petelo. Yeye wakadi ne mapanga ende kadi wakananga Musungidi wende ne dinanga dilelela. Kunshikidilu kua mudimu wende bantu babi bakamushipa bua ditabuja diende.
Petelo, Yakobo ne Yone bakadi bamanyishi ku bimanyinu biakenza Mukelenge Yesu. Yone wakafunda ne, “Yesu wakenza bimanyinu bikuabo bia bungi ku mesu kua bayidi, bidi kabiyi bifundibue mu mukanda ewu; kadi malu aa adi mafundibue bua nuenu nuitabuje ne, Yes
... 
alua muntu mukole mu ditabuja. Nzambi wakasankisha bumanyishi buende ne mudimu wende bua bualu buende mene mene. Satana wakapanga kunyanga ditabuja dia Petelo ne mudimu wende bu muena mudimu wa Mukelenge. Bobo bakakuatibua mu buteyi bua Satana, pakapinganabo kudi Mukelenge bu Petelo, badi mua kuamba ne, Tuasakidila kuikale kudi Nzambi wetu, bualu bua budishikaminyi bua kumuenzela mudimu udi umusankisha.
“Pakashika malu aa, Yesu wakamueneka kabidi kudi bayidi bende ku dishiba dia Tibelia; wakamue
...
layi yende, bu mudi bakuabo babala dishanguluka kadi udi nenu lutulu, kena musue umue wenu ajimine, kadi udi musue bonso, balue kukudimuna mitshima yabo … nunku, nuenu bananga, bualu bua nudi nudianjila kumanya malu aa, dimukayi bua, panuapambuishibua ku mashimi a bantu babi, kanulamuki ku dijadikibua dienu dine. « Muntu kakuikala ne muoyo anu bua bidia nkayabi, kadi bua mei onso adi alupuka munda mua Nzambi » (Lumu luimpe luakafundabu kudi Luka 4. 4).
Edi ndiandamuna dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto kudi Satana muteyanganyi, didi divuluija bena kuitabusha ne, kudisha kua muoyo wa buana bua Nzambi udi munda muabu, ne kudiunda kuabu kua mu nyuma, kudi kufuma ku dibala dilondangane ne dia ku dituku ku dituku dia Dî dia Nzambi.
Bua kukankamika ne kulombola dibala edi, dipungila dipiadipia, tshitupa tshibidi 
... 
a bua muena kuitabuja itabuja lufu ku malu a pa buloba ne ku malu a mubidi wandi nkayandi (mv. 35 ; Lom. 8. 36).
6. Makenga a Kilisto : calvaire
Bilondeshele mulayi wa mu mv. wa 1, bayidi basatu badi babikidibue bua kudianshila kubandila « bukelenge bua Nzambi budi bulua ne bukole ». Bukelenge ebu budi munda mua Mukelenge nkayende, udibu bamanya Yesu, Mulongeshi wabu, muluata buneme ne butumbi budi bubalakana. Yeye wakadi usokoka misangu yonso butumbi ebu mu « ngikadilu wa mupika », udi ububulul
...
a. Mukelenge udi umueneka mu diulu, udi ulombola mudimu wa bantu bandi. Mudimu udi diakalengele dia tshiendelele didi dinanga diandi didilamine. Mupika wa tshiendelele (Dut. 15. 17 ; Luka 12. 37). Udi ukuatshishangana ne bayidi bandi ne kubalombola ne bukole buandi (mv. 20 ; Bienz. 14. 3 ; Ebel. 2. 4). Ne tuetu bena Kilisto badi babikidibue petu bua kulonda nshila yende, ne bamonyi ba lumu luimpe lumu elu, tudi mua kumueyemena petu patudi ne dijinga dia kumukuatshila mudimu ne patudi bamuindile.

Mulong mar makash mashejin piswimp, mudimu wetu wa kulejan udi wa kuswapej. (Jnsw 24:11, 12, 20) Mulong wa kuyikwash antu, tukutwish kusadin kart wa kwiyijikish nich chakwel ashinshikina pa Dizu dia Nzamb ni pa kapend ketu ka web. Kart winou ukwet kode wa video Ov, Mulong wak Kwilej Bibil? ni diladikij mulong wa kutan jinsangu jivud ni kwit dilejan dia Bibil. Antu amwing kakatap kutambul mikand yetu pakwez akat kwitiy kwandam pa kapend ketu. Kangal widjidjek kuyinkish kart wa kwijikish nich. Pakwez, kangal kuyinkish antu akad kusanger kart winou.
Piusadina midimu yey, ukusambish mambamb ni muntu usangaredina ni kulond anch: “Nikwet chom cha kukwink. Nich kart winou ukutwish kwandam pa kapend ka web padia nsangu ni mavideo yikweta mitu ya milong kushalijan.” (Yoh 4:7) Mulong kart wa kwijikish nich udi mukemp, ukutwish kushalap nich makart mawanyidina mulong wa kuyinkish antu akwau.

Bua tshinyi diowa mâyi ku bianza divua tshilumbu tshinene kudi baluishi ba Yezu?
Ebu buvua bumue bua ku malu buvua baluishi ba Yezu bamubanda nabu yeye ne bayidi bende. Mikenji ya Mose ivua ileja tshivua mua kuvuija muntu mukoya, tshilejilu dipatuka dia tufina mu mubidi, nsudi anyi dilenga tshitalu tshia muntu anyi tshia nyama. Mikenji ivua kabidi ileja tshivua muntu mua kuenza bua kuluaye kabidi mukezuke. Uvua mua kulua mukezuke pa kufila milambu, kuowa mâyi anyi kumiamina mashi.—Lewitiki, nsha
... 
mua kuvuija bantu bakuabu bakoya. Balabi bavua kabidi bele mikenji bua mishindu ya malonga ne bintu bivua mua kulua bikoya anyi kubenga kulua bikoya, ne bilele bivua bantu mua kulonda bua kuluabu kabidi bakezuke.
Baluishi ba Yezu bakamuebeja ne: “Bua tshinyi bayidi bebe kabena balonda bilele bia bantu ba kale, kadi badi badia biakudia ne bianza manyanu?” (Mâko 7:5) Bafalese abu kabavua bakula bua mankenda etu mena dîna aa, mmumue ne: bua kuowa mâyi ku bianza kumpala kua kudia to. Bafalese bavua 
...
nza bivuabu ne bua kuela mâyi.”
Ntshinyi tshivua Yezu muenze bua mikenji yonso ivuabu basakidile kudi bantu eyi? Wakambila bamfumu ba bitendelelu bena Yuda ne: “Yeshayi wakambilamu bua bualu buenu, nuenu bena lubombo, anu mudibu bafunde ne: ‘Bantu aba badi bannemeka anu ne mishiku yabu, kadi mioyo yabu kayena kundi [Yehowa], idi kule. Badi batungunuka ne kuntendelela tshianana, bualu badi balongesha anu malongesha a bantu.’ Nudi balekele mikenji ya Nzambi, balamate bilele bia bantu.”—Mâko 7:6-8.

Newandamune tshinyi?
Eyowa?
Tòo?
Imue misangu?
TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA
Dibika dia bafue nedikaleku.”
MUDI MVESE EU UKUAMBULUISHA
Neukole ku muoyo paudi ufuisha.
Kuakutshina kabidi lufu.
Neutekemene bua kupetangana ne bantu baudi mufuishe.
TUDI NE BUA KUITABA TSHIDI BIBLE WAMBA ANYI?
Eyowa, bua malu bu mudi aa:
Nzambi ke utu mufuke muoyo. Bible udi ubikila Yehowa ne: “mpokolo wa muoyo.” (Musambu 36:9, Mukanda wa Mvidi Mukulu [Katolike]; Bienzedi 17:24, 25) Muntu udi mupeshe bifukibua bionso muoyo, udi ne bukole bua kupesha kabidi bantu bakadi bafue muoyo.
Ku kale, Nzambi wakabisha bantu bavua bafue. Bible udi wakula bua bantu muanda mukulu bavuabu babishe ku lufu: bakulumpe ne bana, balume ne bakaji. Bamue bavua bafue kutshivua mutantshi mukese, kadi mukuabu yeye ukavua muenze matuku anayi mu lukita!
—Yone 11:39-44. Nzambi mmusue bikole bua kubisha bantu kabidi. Yehowa katu musue lufu to; utu ulumona bu muluishi. (1 Kolinto 15:26) Udi ne dijinga dikole dia kutshimuna muluishi eu, kumujimija ku diambuluisha dia dibisha dia bantu ku lufu. Mmuindile ne muoyo mujima bua kubisha bantu badi mu lungenyi luende ne kubamona kabidi ne muoyo pa buloba apa.
—Yobo 14:14, 15.
LUKONKO LUKUABU
Tudi tukulakaja ne tufua bua tshinyi?
Bible udi wandamuna lukonko elu mu GENESE 3:17-19 ne mu LOMO 5:12.

Eyowa, banjelu babi badiku. Mbafumine kuepi? Vuluka ne: Nzambi uvua mufuke banjelu ne tshipedi tshia kudisunguila malu. Mutantshi mukese bamane kufuka Adama ne Eva, mulume ne mukaji ba kumpala, muanjelu kampanda mupuangane wakenza mudimu bibi ne budikadidi buende bua kudisunguila malu, kujudijaye buntomboji pa buloba. Wakafikisha Adama ne Eva ku ditombokela Nzambi. (Genese 3: 1-7; Buakabuluibua 12:9) Bible kena utela dîna dia muanjelu au anyi muanzu uvuaye nawu mu diulu kumpala kua kutombokelaye
... 
anjelu babi abu? Pavua Nzambi mulokeshe mvula wa kabutu pa buloba bujima bua kubukezula, banjelu abu bakalekela mibidi ya buntu, kupinganabu miaba ya mu nyuma. Nzambi kakanyishila banjelu babi abu bua kupingana “muaba wabu wa ku ntuadijilu” to. Kadi wakabapuekesha milongo, kubelaye mu “mîdima mikole” ya mu nyuma itudi tubikila ne: Tartare. (Yuda 6; 2 Petelo 2:4) Bademon aba bakaditeka ku bukokeshi bua Satana Diabolo, “mfumu wa bademon,” udi “udivuija bu muanjelu wa butoke.”—Matayi 12:24; 2 Kolin
...
ole budibu nabu. Padi Bukalenge bua Nzambi bujikija kukokesha munkatshi mua bidimu 1000 pa buloba bukudimuna mparadizu, nebalekele banjelu babi aba bua tshitupa tshîpi bua batete bantu bua musangu wa ndekelu. Pashishe nebababutule bua kashidi.—Matayi 25:41; Buakabuluibua 20:1-3, 7-10.
^ tshik. 6 Bua kumanya malu makuabu adi atangila Bukalenge bua Nzambi, bala nshapita wa 8 wa mukanda wa Bible utu ulongesha tshinyi menemene? mupatula kudi Bantemu ba Yehowa. Udi mua kuupetela kabidi mu www.jw.org.

Mulombodi wa ditunga, udi wenza mudimu wa SADC wakaya mu tshisangilu tshia bulongolodi ebu mu Ditanu dia 8 ngondo 5 wa 2023 mu Windhoek mu Namibie, tshisangilu tshivua tshitangila dijadikulula ditalala mu tshitupa tshia Est tshia ditunga dietu.
Tshikondo atshi, bena mu matunga a bena Kristo bakangata dipangadika dikole.
Christophe Lutundula Apala pene Apala, mulombodi wa mfumu wa ditunga, ministre wa malu a panza wa ditunga, wakakula bua bualu ebu ku biro bia mfumu wa ditunga mu mêyi aa:
“Ndi ng
... 
ne didi mu tshiambilu tshia ndekelu tshia tshisangilu etshi tshia bamfumu ba matunga a SADC: Tshisangilu etshi tshiakaanyisha bua kutuma tshiluilu tshia SADC bu tshitupa tshia tshiluilu tshia SADC tshidi tshilongolola bua kuambuluisha ditunga dia République démocratique du Congo bua kupingaja ditalala ne bukubi ku Est. Nunku bidi bimueneka patoke ne: SADC neenze mudimu wa busalayi pa buloba, ne neasungule bua kufila tshiluilu tshiabu diakamue.
SADC wakambila bena mu ditunga dia Congolais bua kue
...
a disangisha dia bantu bonso ne bena malu a pa buloba bujima dienzeke bua kufikisha ku dienza malu mimpe ne adi umvuangana.’
Mfumu wa ditunga uvua anu uteleja bantu bende, ke bualu kayi wakangata dipangadika dia kuenza bualu ebu bua kumona basalayi ba SADC benza mudimu munene bua kujadikulula ditalala dia kashidi, batumikila mukenji wa tshijila wa dilama mikalu ya ditunga dionso bilondeshile mikenji ne bipungidi bia pa buloba bujima.
*Cellcom/Windhoek/08 ngondo 5 mu 2023*
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

Yehowa Efile Mukulu nyi Mwitupangye. Bapangile bintu byoso, abimweka na bish’abimweka. Kumpala kwa kupanga bintu abimweneka, bapangile ba miikeyilu bakile bungi. Ouku shi ba miikeyilu mbantu kinyi? Ba miikeyilu nyi mbantu babaabadi bapangye kwi Yehowa bamwifane. Anka bu byatushi balombeene kumona Efile Mukulu, abo namu’nyi, t’abamwekaa nya. Mwikeeyilu a kumpala abapangile bafikile mukwaashi aaye. Yawa mwikeeyilu bakwashishe Yehowa pabaadi apanga nyenyenye, ma planete na bingi bintu byoso. Umune a ku aa ma planete nyi nsenga, mbalo ibuwa yatudi bashaale.
Akupu, Yehowa balumbulwile nsenga bwa shi nyema na bantu bemushale. Bapangile nguba bwa kumunyika nsenga. Apanga myengye, meema a tulunga na myeela.
Nkinyi kibaadi kikitshikye kunyima? Yehowa bambile shi: ‘Nakyebe kupanga lubishi na mitshi.’ Mitshi ibungi ilekeene ayituusha bikuba, midyoko na bilongo bibungi nkubanga kumena. Akupu, Yehowa nkupanga bipangwa bilekeene—abipapama, abiyowo, abiikaka na abisoboka. Bapangile kubanga ku tupeela bu tupuku, na ku bikata bu ngyefu. Nyema kinyi oodi mufule?
Akupu Yehowa balungwile mwikeeyilu a kumpala shi: “Tupangye muntu.” Bantu be na kya kwikala belekeene na nyema. Abitungu beekale abaakula, abasepe na kwela nteko. Be na kya kulama nsenga na nyema. Ouku baadi muntu a kumpala su? Tubande kutala.

Bilondeshile tshilele tshia bena maneme, muyuki eu wa mushinga mukole wakenzeka mu bitupa bisatu. Miyuki yonso eyi ivua itangila tshilumbu tshia malu a tshididi.
Muanetu wa mu Kasumbu kaludiki ka Bantemu ba Yehowa ke uvua mutuadije kuakula, kuakulaye bua dilomba bantu bua kuenzabu makebulula.
Mukebuludi Mukolo Nkokesha wa ku Kabadi ka Mikenji ya ditunga wakakula bua ” malu adi mua kufikisha muntu ku dibenga kubuela mu tshilumbu tshia masungula “. Wakumvuija ne: mbangate masungula bu mushindu wa 
... 
menga ne dia miaba idibu basungula bantu, bu mudibu bashintulule too ne lelu mu mudimu wa mulumbuluishi wa malu a ditunga wa mu Congo bu mulumbuluishi wa malu a masungula ⁇ . Wakamba ne: bualu ebu buvua buleja ne: bavua baditatshishe bua kulekela malu a tshianana kumpala kua matuku a masungula a mu ngondo wa dikumi ne muibidi mu tshidimu tshia 2023.
Dieudonné Kamuleta wakavuluija ne: Kabadi ka manême a mikenji kakadi kakonkonona bilumbu bia bantu badi balomba bua kubuela mu masungula a bena mbul
...
Kabadi ka malu a tshididi aka, kavua kajadika kudi mikenji ya ditunga ya mu dia 18 ngondo muibidi wa tshidimu tshia 2006 ne kakatuadija kuenza mudimu panyima pa ditapuluka dia Kabadi kakulu ka manême a bantu mu tshidimu tshia 2015. Kabadi aka kadi kalumbuluisha bilumbu bidi bitangila disungula dia mfumu wa ditunga ne dia bena mbulamatadi, ne disungula dia bantu mu ditunga. Kabadi kakulu katu kakosa tshilumbu etshi ku kabadi kansanga to, ne badi ne bua kutshienza diakamue.

Udi mua kulua muledi muimpe mushindu kayi?
Mu lubanza mudi baledi banangangane ne banemekangana, mmuaba muimpe udi muana mua kukolela. (Kolosayi 3:14, 19) Baledi bimpe mbanange bana babu ne batu babanyisha.
Tatu wetu wa mu diulu utu uteleja bantu bende ne utabalela majinga abu. Baledi badi ne bua kuidikija Yehowa pa kuteleja bidi bana babu bajinga kubambila. (Yakobo 1:19) Badi ne bua kumanya mutu bana babu badiumvua, nansha padibu bakula bibi.
Mmunyi muudi mua kukolesha bana bimpe?
Bu muudi muledi, udi ne bukokeshi bua kuelela bana bebe mikenji. (Efeso 6:1) Londa tshilejilu tshia Nzambi. Utu uleja bana bende dinanga padiye ubelela mikenji misunguluke ne ubaleja tshidi mua kubafikila bobu kabayi bayitumikile. (Genese 3:3) Kadi, pamutu pa kuenzeja bantu ku bukole bua bamutumikile, utu ubalongesha mudibu mua kupeta masanka bobu benze tshidi tshimpe.
Difundila tshipatshila tshia kuambuluisha bana bebe bua kunanga Nzambi. Nunku, nebenze malu ne meji nansha bobu bikale pa nkayabu. Anu mudi Nzambi ulongesha ku tshilejilu tshiende, wewe pebe nanga Nzambi bua kushila bana bebe tshilejilu.

‘Muntu yonso adie biende, anue biende, asanke biende mu midimu yende yonso, bua eku nkupa kua Nzambi.’ (Muambi 3:13) Bikala Nzambi musue bua tunange mudimu utudi tuenza, kabienaku bimueneka ne: udi mua kutuleja mutudi mua kuikala ne disanka dia mushindu eu anyi? (Yeshaya 48:17) Diakalenga, udi wenza nanku ku diambuluisha dia Bible, Dîyi diende. Konkonona mibelu ya mu Bible idi ilonda eyi, idi mua kukupesha disanka mu mudimu webe.
IKALA NE MMUENENU MUIMPE BUA MUDIMU
Nansha mudimu webe ukulomba lu
... 
a mu dîku diende bia kudiambuluisha nabi, udi ubambuluisha mu mishindu ibidi. Tshia kumpala, udi wenza bua ne: bikale ne bintu bia ku mubidi bidi ne mushinga bu mudi: biakudia, bilamba ne muaba wa kulala. Dîba adi, udi ukumbaja mudimu udi Nzambi mumupeshe wa ‘kukumbaja majinga a badiye nabu.’ (1 Timote 5:8) Tshibidi, muenji wa mudimu muimpe udi ulongesha bakuabu mudi mudimu mukole ne mushinga padiye yeye muine uwenza bikole. Shane utuvua betele mu tshiena-bualu tshishale udi wamba ne: “Papa wany
...
u wa nkatshinkatshi badi basanka bikole bua mudimu wabu. William utudi batele kuulu eku udi wamba ne: “Umue wa ku bamfumu banyi ba mudimu ba kale udi wenza mudimu ne nkatshinkatshi. Udi wenza mudimu bikole ne udi upetangana ne bantu batu basumba bintu biende bua mudiye wenza mudimu muimpe. Kadi ku ndekelu kua dituku pakadiye muenze mudimu, mmumanye mua kumbuka ku mudimu wende ne kutabalela bena mu dîku diende ne kudifila mu malu a ntendelelu. Katshia ngamanya bantu, mmuntu wa disanka dia bungi!”

Shiship-pishimu 2014
Eshi-pimutenanut nenua e uitakaniti kauapatshemakaki apatina kassinu anite tan ua ishinakuaki atusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikanuiana, kassinu anite tatuiet ka atauenanut, iapit anite nenua (Facebook kie ma Youtube ka ishinikateti) kie mishue anite kassinu eshi-pitutepanieku kie ma tshekuan e apashtaieku anite atusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikanuianit kie ma nenua kutaka e uitakaniti upime tekuaki (« Champion utatusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikanuianim) ue e apashtaua
... 
nite nikaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikannat. Iapit itapashtakanua nenua katshitapatshemakaki tshetshi tipi-mashinataimat nenua eka ka uitakaniti anite uetshipaniti mak mishue e tshitapatakanit tshe uitshikuiat anu tshetshi tshissenitamat etapashtaht anitsenat anite etuteht nikaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikanuiannat mak tshetshi etatu minutaiat tshe ishinakutaiat mak tshekuan anite tshe ashtaiat. Ne uauitamatsheun apu ishi-minikuiat tshetshi ut tshissenimitat auen ne tshin.
Nika apash
...
 tshekuan ne tshinuau etapashtaieku anite Champion ukaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikanuianit. Mitshet tshekuana apashtaiekui tshetshi ituteieku anite Champion ukaitusseu-katshitapatakanit-mashinaikanuianit (atusseu-katshitapatakanit, kaiminanut ne etapatak, atusseu-katshitapatakanit apishe ka ishpishat, kie kutaka), uemt tshika ui tshissenitenau anitshenat kapamishkaht anite nenu tatipan eshinakuannit, tshika nukuan ne tshinuau eshi-menuatameku tshe itapashtaieku nenua katshitapatshemakaki.

Bukalenga bonso wabudia ne bantu e nanku buakulengeleela. Mukalenga wa baantu, baantu wa mukalenga. Mukalenge katu ukuata mudimu nkayende, utu ne badi bamutua nyama ku mikolo. Bine abo ke boobo aba:
• Muadiamvita : Udi mfumu wa tshiluilu tshia mvita. Ulamisha bulongame mu ditunga.
• Kalala : Udi tshindonda tshia Muadiamvita. Uludika tshiluilu : ufileela kumpata kwa lusengenge lua mvita bwa kuleeja pa kuyila ne budimu buvule bua kuepela njiwu, ujingulula luseke ludi baluishi bavuila, bungi buabo 
... 
 Udi muambuluishi wa Kalala ne Muadiamvita. Mu mvita, uvua ne tshisumbu tshia misongolo. Ulamisha bulongame mu ditunga. Udi ulama bena lukanu, ne badi mfumu usua kupa bibau mua kubifutabo.
• Kabwekantanda : Mutangidi ne mulami wa malaba a ditunga: mpata, meetu, misulu ne majiba. Utangila milambo ya nyama idibo bashipa ne mishipa idibo bakwata ne biadidia bionso bidibo banowa: biamfumu ne biabaantu.
• Tshipanzula : Udi muakididi wa benyi ba mfumu, kubakebela bia kudia ne kubateeka mu muaba wa kul
...
 ludi lumubikula.
• Kakona : mMulaminyi wa mfumu bintu biende bilenga mu luendu. Muende ke mudibo batwilangana kudi Banena bonso bua kukonkonona ne kusuika dîyi pa mianda kanipande ya ditunga pamwe ne mienampala ya mfumu.
• Ndalamumba : Mueledi wa bakishi ba ditunga bavua bakalenga nshima ne kubatendeleela.
• Luaba : ki eu udi upingana mfumu mu bukalenga. Yeye ke udi waba bukalenge. Yeye ke udi upatula bintu bia kudia nabio bumfumu.
Crispin Mukendi Mutshika Mesu
Mbuji-Mayi / Kasaï-Oriental / RDC

Bible wa Tshijila mmukenji mufunda wa Nzambi mututumina tuetu bonso. Tudi ne bua kumulonga bua kufika ku dimanya Muenaye. (Yone 17:3; 2 Timote 3:16) Munda muende, Yehowa Nzambi udi usokololamu malu adiye mulongoluele bantu ne buloba budibu basombele.—Genese 3:15; Buakabuluibua 21:3, 4.
Kakuena mukanda mukuabu udi ushintulula nsombelu ya bantu bu eu to. Bible udi utusaka bua kuleja ngikadilu ya Yehowa bu mudi: dinanga, luse ne diditeka pa muaba wa bakuabu. Udi ufila ditekemena, wambuluisha bantu 
... 
u 2 600. Mmukanda udibu batambe kukudimuna ne kuabanya kupita mikuabu yonso. Ke tshituvua ne bua kutekemena bua mukanda wa nunku. Mêyi a buprofete a mu Bible adi amba ne: “Nebayishe lumu luimpe elu lua Bukalenge [mukenji munene udi mu Bible] pa buloba bujima budi bantu basombele bua luikale bujadiki kudi bisamba bionso, ne pashishe, nshikidilu nealue.”—Matayi 24:14.
Bu mutudi bamanye mushinga udi nawu mukenji wa mu Bible, tshipatshila tshietu ntshia kupatula nkudimuinu udi mulamate ku mifundu ya
...
yi dia Nzambi udi mujalame ne umvuika bimpe. (1 Timote 2:4) Bua bualu abu, tudi bapatule Bible eu mu Tshiluba, mu diumvuangana ne tshipatshila tshietu tshia kukudimuna Bible—Nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia mu miakulu ya bungi. Tudi batekemene ne tudi tusambila buebe wewe, mubadi musuibue, ne: mukanda eu wa Mifundu Minsantu ukuambuluishe paudi udienzeja bua ‘kukeba Nzambi ne kumupeta bushuwa.’—Bienzedi 17:27.
Komite wa dikudimuna Bible wa nkudimuinu wa bulongolodi bupiabupia
Ngondo wa 8/2013

‘Kanupu muoyo bua kuleja benyi luse.’—EBELU 13:2, MNZ.
MISAMBU: 124, 79
1, 2. a) Nntatu kayi itu benyi ba bungi bapeta lelu? (Tangila tshimfuanyi tshia ntuadijilu tshia tshiena-bualu.) b) Ndidimuija kayi divua mupostolo Paulo mufile? c) Nnkonko kayi ituandamuna?
KUKADI bidimu bipite pa 30 pavua Osei uvua kayi muanji kuikala Ntemu wa Yehowa mumbuke mu Ghana muye kusombela ku Mputu. [1] (Tangila note ku ndekelu.) Udi wamba ne: “Pangakafika, ngakamona ne: bantu ba bungi kabavua bantabalela to. Mivu
... 
uena lulamatu Boaza wakidikija mushindu uvua Yehowa umona benyi. Mushindu kayi? Pavua Boaza muye kutangila madimi ende mu tshikondo tshia dinowa, wakamona Luta, mukaji muenyi wa mu buloba bua Moaba. Mukaji eu uvua wenza mudimu mukole wa kuangula ntete mu budimi. Bilondeshile Mikenji ya Mose, Luta uvua ne bukenji bua kupumbulula. Kadi pavua Boaza mumvue ne: uvua mulombe dianyisha bua kupumbulula mu budimi buende, biakamulenga ku muoyo bikole ne wakamuanyishila bua kupumbulula mu bisumbu bia ntete
...
bavua pamuapa kabayi mua kupeta mushindu wa kulonga Bible anyi kudisangisha ne bantu ba Yehowa. Kadi mpindieu udibu ne diakalenga dia kudisangisha netu, tudi ne bua kubambuluisha bua kabadimonyi bu benyi. Tudi mua kuikala katuyi ne makuta a bungi anyi katuyi ne mushindu wa kuambuluisha benyi mudibi bikengela, kadi patudi tubenzela malu mimpe, tudi tuidikija mushindu udi Yehowa mubanange. Bu mutudi “bidikiji ba Nzambi,” tuenzayi muetu muonso bua kuakidila benyi badi munkatshi muetu.—Efeso 5:1, 2.

- Tshikosu tshia ngumu:
- Matadi:Polovense wa kongo central mulua bienda ku disanga ku eyi yidi ne babedi ba covid 19 .
- Kinshasa: Bua disama dia covid 19 , polovense wa kongo central mulua bienda kubueja mu polovense yidi milengibua ne babedi 2 .
- Bandundu: Mu Province wa Kwilu, division provinciale dia malu a bukola bua mubidi mu njila wa programme national Santé de la reproduction, PNSR badi badifila bua kuambuluisha bakaji ne baluma badi basomba ku basomba ku mbanza yabu.
- Kinshasa: Bena ISAM anyi Institut Supérieur des Arts et Métiers badi biabu badifila mu ditela masques bua kuimanyika ditampakana dia disama dia covid 19 .
- Kinshasa: Mfumu wa ditunga udi ulomba kudi ministre wa Fonction publique àbua kuanji kumanyika mukanda wenda mutua tshiala bua diteka ba fundi bakulu ba midimu y ambula matadi.
- Bunia: Mu Ituri, baluma ba mvita ba CODECO badi batungunuka ne diyobesha bantu mu njila munena wa nationale numéro 27, udi utuangaja Bunia ne Djugu, Mahagi ne Aru. Makelela mushala kaniemesha umua uvua mushipa kudi ba nkoviongo aba ne bantu basatu batapika ku masashi .
- Goma: Ku Nord Kivu , meku matua ku binunu 10 munkatshi bena tshimuangi badi ne dikenga dikola , mbapeta diambuluisha dia bena PAM ne FAO dia bia kudia .

RDC -ONU:
Dikumbula dia bena kasumbu ka bukubi ka matunga masanga mu ditunga dia congo dijika lelu Wa dia lumingu .
Lelu wa dia lumingu dia matuku dikumi ni ibidi ngondo muisatu ewu , bana betu aba bakafika mu tshimenga tshia Goma bua kujikija luendu luabu lua matuku anayi mu ditunga dia Congo Wa mungalata .
Panyima pa bamane kuteleja ne bamane kuakula bua nsombelu mubi wa malu a bukubi ne a bukua bantu ku est kua ditunga dia Congo, bamfumu babidi aba ne baleji mpala ba Gabon ne ba France benza 
... 
 anyi ba kamuna kamba mu tshimenga tshia Goma.
Pa bidi bitangila mvita ya tshiluilu tshia ditunga dia Rwanda mu ditunga dia Congo pamue ne kasumbu ka bena tshinyangu ka M23, mumanyishi wa ditunga dia France ku ONU wakamba ne: tshilumbu etshi tshidi ntshianji kukonkonona Kasumbu ka bukubi bua matunga masanga.
Mbimueneke patoke ne: kudi malu adi afumina kudi ditunga dia Rwanda mu Nord-Kivu, bualu budi kabuyi mua kuanyishibua nasha”, ke muvua Nicolas de Rivière muleje.
“Tudi ne bua kuambuluisha dit
...
tique du Congo bua kutantamena lutatu lua bukua bantu ludi lufumina ku dikuatshisha dia Angola”
Muambi wa ditunga dia Gabon Michel-Xavier Biang udi ngela meji ne: ditunga dia Gabon didi ne bubanji bua bungi.
Malu makuabu avuabu bakonkonone bumudi : ditanta dia tshitupa etshi, masungula adi alua mu ditunga dia Congo ne malu adi enza bua tshipungidi tshia mu Addis Abeba, tshidi mulombodi wa ditunga dia Gabon muambe ne: ntshijadiki tshidi ne bua kulombola bantu ba pa buloba bujima.
*Gloire Kabongo*

MMUNTU wa mushindu kayi uudi mua kusungula bu mulunda? Kakuyi mpata, udi mua kujinga kusomba ne muntu udi umona malu bu wewe. Udi kabidi mua kusungula muntu udi ne ngikadilu milenga.

ue udi ukungula, ukeba bantu ba kudiaye.’ (1 Petelo 5:8) Nunku tudi mua kumona buluishi bua Satana padi balunda, balela anyi bantu bakuabu batuluisha patudi tulonga Bible ne tutumikila bitudi tulonga.* ( Yone 15:19, 20) Tshibidi, Satana ‘utu udiandamuna bu muanjelu wa munya.’ (2 Kolinto 11:14) Diabolo utu wenza mudimu muinshimuinshi bua kukudinga ne kukupangisha bua kuikala ne nsombelu udi usankisha Nzambi. Lieutenant général Constant Ndima Katuena tuenza ngendu mu Nord-Kivu to
Mu dia matuku dikumi ni muanda mutekete ngondo muisatu wa 2023, Ndima Kongba Constant, mfumu munene wa basalayi wakangata mudimu wa kulombola midimu ya basalayi mu Nord-Kivu.
Constant Ndima nguvena wa Nord-Kivu katshia ku diteka dia dikandika mu ngondo wa muitanu wa 2021, wakamba ne “tshiena ngenza ngendu” mu provense eu udi ne bintu bia mushinga mukole ne wakavuluija ne: mudimu wende ngua kujadikulula ditalala, nangananga m
... 
u tshia M23.
Muena mudimu mu Nord-Kivu, katuena mu luendu to, tudi balue bua kukumbaja mudimu udi munene wa basalayi ne bamfumu betu batupeshe “, ke muvua général Constant Ndima muambe.
Wakela mulombodi Félix Tshisekedi tuasakidila ne mulaye bua kukumbaja mudimu wende ne lulamatu.
Ndi ngela mulombodi munene wa tshiluilu tshia Congo ne wa bampulushi ba ditunga dia Congo tuasakidila bua ditabuja didiye mumpeshe ne ndi mumulaye bu mulombodi wanyi munene bua kuenza mudimu wonso udiye mumpeshe ne lul
...
etu bua kubapesha ditalala didibu bindile bikole”.
Nunku Constant Ndima udi upingana kabidi ku bukokeshi bua kamulekela ngondo mikese kumpala bua General Mbangu Marcel upingana ku nzubu wende munene wa basalayi mu Kisangani mu tshitupa tshia tshisatu tshia bukubi.
Mudimu mukole udi kumpala kua Constant Ndima udi wa kuluangana ne bantomboji ba M23 badibu batua nyama ku mikolo kudi ditunga dia Rwanda, badi bakuate misoko ne bimenga binene bia Rutshuru, Nyiragongo ne Masisi.
Shekinah Gloire Kabongo

34 Nunku newikale bu muntu udi mulale munkatshi mua mbuu,Bu muntu udi mulale pa lusongo lua mutshi wa tshilamba tshitubu baludika natshi mazuwa.
35 Wewe newambe ne: “Mbankume, kadi tshivua mumvue.Mbantute, kadi tshivua mumanye.Nembike dîba kayi?+Ndi dijinga ne kunua kabidi.”
